Lines.Text: Have you reached our goal of 100 gold in donations from the Argonian mission? Or have you come to report your failure?
Scripts: Choice "No, but I'm working on it." 1 "I'm sorry, but I can't seem to raise the gold." 2

Lines.Text: Very well. Carry on, %Rank %PCName.

You're not trying hard enough, %PCName. We are disappointed. We all need to do our part for Imperial cult. But it's your decision. Perhaps you should take some time off and decide whether your talents and temperaments are suited for fund raising. When you approach us again for an almoner's mission, be sure you want to give us your full commitment.

Very good, %PCName. This gold will help us serve our community of faith. Congratulations. And accept this small blessing as a token of our thanks. When you're ready for your next almoner mission, speak to me again.

Excellent! You've far exceeded our expectations. Surely you have a touch of Zenithar in your soul. Please accept this small token of our gratitude and encouragement. And when you're ready for your next almoner mission, speak to me again.

You must take a full day to decide whether your talents and temperaments are suited for fund raising. Then when you are sure you want to give us your full commitment, come to me for another almoner's mission.

Go ask the Argonian Mission in Ebonheart for alms for the poor. Their province is not so rich as Skyrim, but they are a generous and civic-minded people. Our fund raising goal for the Argonian mission is 100 gold. When you have reached our goal, return and deliver the gold to me.
Have you reached our goal of 100 gold in donations from the Skyrim mission? Or have you come to report your failure?
Scripts: Choice "No, but I'm working on it." 1 "I'm sorry, but I can't seem to raise the gold." 2 "Yes, I've reached our goal." 3 "I have DOUBLED our goal!" 4

Lines.Text: Have you reached our goal of 100 gold in donations from the Skyrim mission? Or have you come to report your failure?
Scripts: Choice "No, but I'm working on it." 1 "I'm sorry, but I can't seem to raise the gold." 2 "Yes, I've reached our goal." 3

Lines.Text: Have you reached our goal of 100 gold in donations from the Skyrim mission? Or have you come to report your failure?
Scripts: Choice "No, but I'm working on it." 1 "I'm sorry, but I can't seem to raise the gold." 2

Lines.Text: Then what can I do for you?

Thank Zenithar! We have so many projects, and so little gold. Go ask the Skyrim Mission in Ebonheart for alms for the poor. They should give generously to support the Imperial cult. Our fund raising goal for the Skyrim mission is 100 gold. When you have reached our goal, return and deliver the gold to me.
Hello. I am Iulus Truptor. I manage the volunteer almoners for our cult. If you are ready to accept a fund raising project as an almoner, let me know.
Scripts: Choice "I'm ready for an almoner project." 1 "I have something else to ask about." 2

Lines.Text: In your zeal to serve the needs of the Imperial cult, don't forget your own interests. Have you checked your advancement in the Imperial cult? As you serve Zenithar and the Nine, your diligent service shall bring you rise in rank.

Go ask the Argonian Mission in Ebonheart for alms for the poor. Their province is not so rich as Skyrim, but they are a generous and civic-minded people. Our fund raising goal for the Argonian mission is 100 gold. When you have reached our goal, return and deliver the gold to me.

The shrine at Buckmoth Legion Fort has experienced an unfortunate shortfall in alms for the poor, and funds are urgently needed to purchase food and blankets for orphans and indigents. Please go to Ald'ruhn and see if you can raise the money for the Buckmoth Fund. The fund needs at least 100 drakes immediately. It may be difficult to raise funds, since Ald'ruhn is a Redoran town, and most residents are Dunmer, but this money is very badly needed.

For our coming Harvest's End pageant, we need a red shirt with a black vest. Please visit clothiers and ask if they would donate such a shirt and vest to the cult. The combination of shirt and vest is what they call a 'common shirt.' When you have the red shirt with a black vest, return and deliver them to me.

The Balmora shrine is planning a fundraising dinner at Fort Moonmoth. We will need food and refreshments. We've had generous offers of food, but we've had trouble getting donations of strong spirits. We've determined that we need 5 bottles of Cyrodilic brandy. Please make the rounds of the tradehouses and cornerclubs in Balmora and ask if the publicans will donate Cyrodilic brandy. When you have the brandy, please deliver it to me.

Cunius Pelelius of the Caldera Mining Company is a member in good standing, and a prominent citizen, but unfortunately he has not been forthcoming with donations to help us in our good works. Please speak with him, and see if you can persuade him to donate 500 drakes to our Widows and Orphans Fund. You'll find him in Caldera at the Governor's Hall. When you've obtained the donation, deliver it to me.

Canctunian Ponius of the East Empire Company has promised to sponsor a mission to the Ashlanders. Such a long-term mission will be quite expensive -- 1000 drakes is a bare minimum. We're concerned that we haven't received the money he pledged, and that he does not reply to our correspondence. We wish you to go to him in the East Empire Company Hall in Ebonheart and persuade him to provide us with the generous pledge as he promised.
'How dry I am... how dry I am... nobody knows... how dry I am....' SHAY! Hi. There. Lesh make a deal. I got... stuff. Lots. Here. See?
Just go away and leave me alone.
Thank you again for rescuing me. And don't forget to speak to my father Hassour Zainsubani at the Ald Skar Inn in Ald'ruhn.

Thank you, %PCName. I owe you my life. As you can see, I have nothing to give you. But go speak to my father, Hassour Zainsubani, at the Ald Skar Inn in Ald'ruhn, for courage and generosity must always be rewarded. Tell him that I am well, and will come to him as soon as I can. I have no token you might show him, but tell him that I blossom 'anew beneath tomorrow's sun' -- he will know who has sent you.

My name is Hannat Zainsubani. I entered this cavern seeking shelter from the weather, and these madmen stripped me and imprisoned me here. While I've been trapped here, I've had the most terrible dreams. I... don't know if I can trust my own eyes and ears. Please. I need an armed escort to the cavern entrance. They have left me nothing. I cannot offer you reward. But my father, Hassour Zainsubani, in Ald'ruhn, will gift you generously if you can rescue me.
Hello, %PCName. Is there any specific place you'd like to see while you're here? Any services you need? Someone in particular you're looking for?
Hello again, %PCName. Thanks again for the potions. Now, is there any specific place you'd like to see while you're here? Any services you need? Someone in particular you're looking for?
Welcome, %PCRank %PCName. Welcome to the Fort Darius shrine. And many thanks to you and Synnolian for the Restore Health potions. Our stock was very low. Now, before you go, can I return your favor?

Welcome, %PCRank %PCName. Welcome to the Fort Darius shrine. And many thanks to you and Synnolian for the Restore Health potions. Our stock was very low. While you're up here, take a look around Fort Darius. The Legion is always looking for loyal, able citizens of good character. Speak to General Darius over at Madach's Tradehouse. Now, before you go, can I return your favor?

Welcome, %PCRank %PCName. Welcome to the Fort Darius shrine. You're up here for Shand's muck? Look up in Gnisis village, east of the Temple. Just help yourself. It's all arranged with Shand. Now, is there any specific place you'd like to see while you're here? Any services you need?

Welcome, %PCRank %PCName. Welcome to the Fort Darius shrine. While you're up here, take a look around Fort Darius. The Legion is always looking for loyal, able citizens of good character. Speak to General Darius over at Madach's Tradehouse. Now, is there any specific place you'd like to see while you're here? Any services you need?
Yes. You come from Sera Synnolian, yes? For muck? You know the muckspunge, yes? Outside my door, fat, whitish bulbs, like big pots, yes? You get for yourself, take what you need, no problem.
Well, well! You brung me a little present from Sera Synnolian, eh? Good on you. He's a good old f'lah, for an outlander. And what can I do you for?
Well, well! You come from Sera Synnolian, eh? Good on you. He's a good old f'lah, for an outlander. And what can I do you for?
Good day to see you again, %PCName. Sorry I don't have time to pass the day with you. Farmer's work is never done. But give my regards to Sera Synnolian when you see him.
Good day to you, %PCName. Is there anything I can do you for?
So. You're the Nerevarine, eh? Whoop-tee-do. Don't have much call for Nerevarines down this way. Good day.
You're not from 'round here, are you? Then it's just as well you keep moving. We don't much like strangers around here. Good day.
You were forgiven once, but you persist in your crimes against your fellow cult members. Now you are expelled, for once and for all. We have nothing more to talk about.
You've been expelled. I have nothing more to say to you. If you repent your misdeeds, you must speak to Lalatia Varian or Kaye to join the Imperial cult again.

You have shown yourself to be a loyal and diligent member of the Imperial cult, %PCName. As a token of our appreciation, here is a little gift that may make your labors a little easier. And please remember: check your advancement in our ranks regularly.

You have shown yourself to be a loyal and diligent member of the Imperial cult, %PCName. As a token of our appreciation, here is a little gift that may make your labors a little easier. And please remember: check your advancement in our ranks regularly.

You have shown yourself to be a loyal and diligent member of the Imperial cult, %PCName. As a token of our appreciation, here is a little gift that may make your labors a little easier. And please remember: check your advancement in our ranks regularly.

You have shown yourself to be a loyal and diligent member of the Imperial cult, %PCName. As a token of our appreciation, here is a little gift that may make your labors a little easier. And please remember: check your advancement in our ranks regularly.
%PCName. I have no further tasks for you. Did you have a question?
Hello again, %PCName. I have no tasks for you. Did you have a question for me?

I see you have brought me a unit of netch leather. Here are several potions, and a little present -- a belt of Balyna's Soothing Balm. Saint Balyna is one of Mara's patron saints, and her dedicated service to the Nine Divines and their followers is a model for us all. I have no more tasks for you. Perhaps you should speak to Kaye about shrine sergeants, or to Iulus Truptor about almoners. Or speak to the Oracle, Lalatia Varian. Perhaps you can help her.

It is wise to know your limitations. But we are disappointed. We are granted only so many chances to prove our faith, and each failure diminishes us. Take some time to reflect on your shortcomings, and attempt to amend them before you approach us again for a lay healer mission.
Very well. Carry on.
Have you brought me one unit of netch leather for cure paralyzation potions? Or have you come to report your failure?
Scripts: Choice "No, I am still trying." 1 "I admit my failure, and beg for forgiveness." 2

Lines.Text: I see you have brought me five units of rat meat. Here is a Cure Poison potion for you. And since these little errands are becoming a little more dangerous, here are a couple of books you might find useful. Now. Speak to me again when you are ready for another lay healer mission. And don't forget to check for advancement....

It is wise to know your limitations. But we are disappointed. We are granted only so many chances to prove our faith, and each failure diminishes us. Take some time to reflect on your shortcomings, and attempt to amend them before you approach us again for a lay healer mission.
Very well. Carry on.
You must take time to reflect upon your shortcomings and attempt to amend them before coming to me for another lay healer mission.

Bring me one unit of netch leather for cure paralyzation potions. The Ascadian Isles is a good place to hunt. I suggest you start by looking around near Balur Salvu's house. He says he sees wild bull netch all the time. Now, stick with bull netch to start with. The betty netch are rather more dangerous.
Have you brought me five units of rat meat for cure poison potions? Or have you come to report your failure?
Scripts: Choice "No, I am still trying." 1 "I admit my failure, and beg for forgiveness." 2

Lines.Text: I see you have brought me five units of corkbulb root. Here are a Cure Common Disease potion and a Restore Health potion for you, and thank you very much. You will, of course, remember to check on your advancement. Speak to me again when you are ready for another lay healer mission.

It is wise to know your limitations. But we are disappointed. We are granted only so many chances to prove our faith, and each failure diminishes us. Take some time to reflect on your shortcomings, and attempt to amend them before you approach us again for a lay healer mission.
Very well. Carry on.
You must take time to reflect upon your shortcomings and attempt to amend them before coming to me for another lay healer mission.

Bring me five units of rat meat for cure poison potions. The best place to hunt rats is in the underworks of any of Vivec's cantons. Enter the underworks through trapdoors in the canalworks, or enter through the exterior outflow drains underwater along the sides of each canton -- if you don't mind a swim. And be careful. Sometimes bad things -- and bad people -- hide in the underworks. So don't go poking into anything you can't handle.
Have you brought me five units of corkbulb root for cure common disease and restore health potions? Or have you come to report your failure?
Scripts: Choice "No, I am still trying." 1 "I admit my failure, and beg for forgiveness." 2

Lines.Text: I see you have brought me five units of scrib jelly. Here are a Cure Poison potion and a Cure Blight potion for you, and an alembic for your potion-making. Please remind me to check your advancement in our ranks. And speak to me again when you are ready for another lay healer mission.

It is wise to know your limitations. But we are disappointed. We are granted only so many chances to prove our faith, and each failure diminishes us. Take some time to reflect on your shortcomings, and attempt to amend them before you approach us again for a lay healer mission.
Very well. Carry on.
You must take time to reflect upon your shortcomings and attempt to amend them before coming to me for another lay healer mission.

Bring me five units of corkbulb for cure common disease and restore health potions. The best place to look for corkbulb is the Ascadian Isles, and Arvel Manor in particular. The Imperial Cult has an agreement with the Ascadian Isles plantation owners that permits us to gather corkbulb. The direct route means swimming, so I'll teach you a little spell.
Have you brought me five units of scrib jelly for cure poison and cure blight potions? Or have you come to report your failure?
Scripts: Choice "No, I am still trying." 1 "I admit my failure, and beg for forgiveness." 2

Lines.Text: So. You have brought me five units of willow anther. Here is a Cure Paralyzation potion for you, and a little something extra, since you've been such a diligent helper. I learned a great deal from this book, but I know it's lessons by heart. I'd like you to have my old copy, and I hope it brings you the same satisfaction it brought me. Speak to me again when you are ready for another lay healer mission. And don't forget to check for advancement.

It is wise to know your limitations. But we are disappointed. We are granted only so many chances to prove our faith, and each failure diminishes us. Take some time to reflect on your shortcomings, and attempt to amend them before you approach us again for a lay healer mission.
Very well. Carry on.
You must take time to reflect upon your shortcomings and attempt to amend them before coming to me for another lay healer mission.

Bring me five units of scrib jelly for cure poison and cure blight potions. The closest reliable source of scribs is the Shulk Egg mine, southwest of Balmora, on the west bank of the Ouadi Oadi, near a swinging bridge. The kwama worker is not aggressive, but the kwama warrior and kwama forager are another matter. Be careful with them. I'll teach you the Detect Creature spell to help you hunt scribs.
Have you brought me five units of willow anther for cure common disease potions? Or have you come to report your failure?
Scripts: Choice "No, I am still trying." 1 "I admit my failure, and beg for forgiveness." 2

Lines.Text: I see you have brought me five units of muck. Thank you very much. Here is a Cure Common Disease potion for you, and a copy of 'The Alchemists Formulary', a collection of popular alchemical recipes. And maybe this spare retort will be useful for your potion-making. Practice, practice, practice! Speak to me again when you are ready for another lay healer mission. And remind me to check on your advancement in the cult. You deserve recognition for your labors.

It is wise to know your limitations. But we are disappointed. We are granted only so many chances to prove our faith, and each failure diminishes us. Take some time to reflect on your shortcomings, and attempt to amend them before you approach us again for a lay healer mission.
Very well. Carry on.
You must take time to reflect upon your shortcomings and attempt to amend them before coming to me for another lay healer mission.

Bring me five units of willow anther for cure paralyzation potions. I am ashamed to admit it, but I steal willow anther from the flowers growing around the house of Gurak gro-Bagrat. His house is on the mainland, just north of the Foreign Quarter. A cleric stealing from criminals to aid the needy... perhaps I have been hanging around Zenithar-worshippers too long.
Have you brought me five units of muck for cure common disease potions? Or have you come to report your failure?
Scripts: Choice "No, I am still trying." 1 "I admit my failure, and beg for forgiveness." 2

Lines.Text: I see you have brought me five units of marshmerrow. Here is a Restore Health potion for you, and a mortar and pestle so you can practice making your own Restore Health potions. Speak to me again when you are ready for another lay healer mission. And goodness! I was so busy, I almost forgot. Have you checked your advancement in the Imperial cult? As you serve Mara and the Nine, so shall you rise in rank.

It is wise to know your limitations. But we are disappointed. We are granted only so many chances to prove our faith, and each failure diminishes us. Take some time to reflect on your shortcomings, and attempt to amend them before you approach us again for a lay healer mission.
Very well. Carry on.
You must take time to reflect upon your shortcomings and attempt to amend them before coming to me for another lay healer mission.

We need five units of muck for cure common disease potions. A farmer in Gnisis, Abishpulu Shand, has a muckspunge patch near his hut, and Chaplain Ogrul at Fort Darius has a deal with Shand to gather muck there for free. Let me put Gnisis on your map. And while you're in Gnisis, visit Chaplain Ogrul and give him these four Restore Health potions. And ask him if he'll teach you a few tricks. When you have the muck, bring it back to me. And here's 80 drakes for the silt strider fare. It's a long walk.
Have you brought me five units of marshmerrow? Or have you come to report your failure?
Scripts: Choice "No, I am still trying." 1 "I admit my failure, and beg for forgiveness." 2

Lines.Text: What was it you wanted?

Mara be praised! So much to do, and so little time. Please, bring me five units of marshmerrow for restore health potions. Balur Salvu, a farmer in the western Ascadian Isles, near Pelagiad, grows marshmerrow. Bring him this potion as a gift, and he'll tell you where to pick the marshmerrow.
Hello. I am Synnolian Tunifus. I manage the lay healer volunteers for our cult. If you are ready to accept a task as a lay healer, let me know.
Scripts: Choice "I'm ready for a lay healer task." 1 "I have something else to ask about." 2

Lines.Text: Goodness. I was so busy, I almost forgot. Have you checked your advancement in the Imperial cult? As you serve Mara and the Nine, so shall you rise in rank.

We need five units of muck for cure common disease potions. A farmer in Gnisis, Abishpulu Shand, has a muckspunge patch near his hut, and Chaplain Ogrul at Fort Darius has a deal with Shand to gather muck there for free. Let me put Gnisis on your map. And while you're in Gnisis, visit Chaplain Ogrul and give him these four Restore Health potions. And ask him if he'll teach you a few tricks. When you have the muck, bring it back to me. And here's 80 drakes for the silt strider fare. It's a long walk.

Bring me five units of willow anther for cure paralyzation potions. I am ashamed to admit it, but I steal willow anther from the flowers growing around the house of Gurak gro-Bagrat. His house is on the mainland, just north of the Foreign Quarter. A cleric stealing from criminals to aid the needy... perhaps I have been hanging around Zenithar-worshippers too long.

Bring me five units of scrib jelly for cure poison and cure blight potions. The closest reliable source of scribs is the Shulk Egg mine, southwest of Balmora, on the west bank of the Ouadi Oadi, near a swinging bridge. The kwama worker is not aggressive, but the kwama warrior and kwama forager are another matter. Be careful with them. I'll teach you the Detect Creature spell to help you hunt scribs.

Bring me five units of corkbulb for cure common disease and restore health potions. The best place to look for corkbulb is the Ascadian Isles, and Arvel Manor in particular. The Imperial Cult has an agreement with the Ascadian Isles plantation owners that permits us to gather corkbulb. The direct route means swimming, so I'll teach you a little spell.

Bring me five units of rat meat for cure poison potions. The best place to hunt rats is in the underworks of any of Vivec's cantons. Enter the underworks through trapdoors in the canalworks, or enter through the exterior outflow drains underwater along the sides of each canton -- if you don't mind a swim. And be careful. Sometimes bad things -- and bad people -- hide in the underworks. So don't go poking into anything you can't handle.

Bring me one unit of netch leather for cure paralyzation potions. The Ascadian Isles is a good place to hunt. I suggest you start by looking around near Balur Salvu's house. He says he sees wild bull netch all the time. Now, stick with bull netch to start with. The betty netch are rather more dangerous.
Go ahead. You're not interrupting anything. I'm Elone, Scout. You need directions? Pelagiad? Balmora? Caldera? Ebonheart? Vivec?

Welcome to Arrille's Tradehouse. I'm Arrille, publican and proprietor. Don't take what doesn't belong to you. You're a new face here. If you want to buy from me, you have to barter. If you want a little advice -- free to new customers -- just ask. Would you like to hear about our most popular potions? Our most popular scrolls?
What can I do for you, %PCRank?
Someday you may replace me as the Grandmaster of the Morag Tong.
Have the leaders of the Dark Brotherhood met their end in Ald Sotha?
How goes the fight in Assernerairan?
Have you found the Ring of Sanguine Sublime Wisdom?
What did Carecalmo say to our ultimatum?
Will Movis Darys join us?
Have you found the Belt of Sanguine Fleetness?
Were you able to contact the Dark Brotherhood?
Yes, %PCRank. You have come to see what writs are open. Or perhaps you want special duties to spread the Night Mother's glory.
Have you killed Feruren Oran? Are you ready to join the Morag Tong?
You have the will and the strength. Take the rank of Grandmaster for yourself.
Yes, %PCRank? Are you here to see what writs are open?
Yes, we travel together to the Mabrigash camp.
Can you get me out of here? Let's travel together.
So, %PCName. You are called Nerevarine, and Han-Ammu is now our ashkhan. Many changes. Many changes.

You have slain one of the peace-loving Erabenimsun. You deserve to die. Though we have no champion to bring us justice, we still have our pride. We will not treat with you, even though you threaten to murder us, too.

You have slain one of the peace-loving Erabenimsun. You deserve to die. Though we have no champion to bring us justice, we still have our pride. We will not treat with you, even though you threaten to murder us, too.

You have slain one of the peace-loving Erabenimsun. You deserve to die. Though we have no champion to bring us justice, we still have our pride. We will not treat with you, even though you threaten to murder us, too.

You have slain one of the peace-loving Erabenimsun. You deserve to die. Though we have no champion to bring us justice, we still have our pride. We will not treat with you, even though you threaten to murder us, too.
You are the outlander who claims to be the Nerevarine? You'll find no welcome here, I'm afraid.
You are the outlander who claims to be the Nerevarine? You'll find no welcome here, I'm afraid.
You are the outlander who claims to be the Nerevarine? You'll find no welcome here, I'm afraid.
You are the outlander who claims to be the Nerevarine? You'll find no welcome here, I'm afraid.

Outlander. You'll find no welcome here, I'm afraid.
Outlander. You'll find no welcome here, I'm afraid.

Outlander. You'll find no welcome here, I'm afraid.
Outlander. You'll find no welcome here, I'm afraid.
Outlander. You'll find no welcome here, I'm afraid.
Outlander. You'll find no welcome here, I'm afraid.
A visitor! And an outlander, too! What brings you to Nerano Manor?
You found Ralen Hlaalo's murderer. I'm staying here until all his accounts are settled.
It's just terrible what happened. Ralen Hlaalo employed me for years. What will I do now?
Thank you for my freedom, %PCRace. I know a little secret about Orvas Dren you might find useful.
Ilmeni sent you? Shall we travel together?
Yes, %PCRace? What can I do for you?
Welcome, I am %Name. What can I do for you %PCRank?
Yes, %PCRank %PCName? What can I do for you?
You're not supposed to be here, Telvanni
You're not supposed to be here, Hlaalu
You're not supposed to be here, Redoran.
I am Hetman Guls. What can I do for you?
What are you here for, Hlaalu? Didn't I already tell Edryno that I didn't have the debt money?
You killed the thief. Good work. I wish I could afford a guard like you to stay here all the time. Edryno Arethi has your fee.
The thief is back! Get him before he gets away!
Great timing, %PCRank. The thief came in right behind you.
I do not care what Hlaren Ramoran might have to say. I will not see him. That is final.

What? You say that Hlaren Ramoran wants to meet with me? Even if it would disgrace him? No, even now that I will not do. I never liked the way he kept hanging around like a lost scrib. Tell him once more that my answer is still no.
I had word you hired someone to guard against bandits.
So you've hired me. Should we fight together?
I will have that amulet!
Thanks, %PCName. It was a real pleasure working with you.
Great. Thanks, %PCName. I'm going to stay here and explore a bit. Good luck to you.
So maybe that isn't my father's amulet.... But I want it anyway, and if you won't give it to me, I'll have to take it myself.
So you found my father's amulet. Just hand it over and I'll let you keep whatever else you wish.
Scripts: Choice "Give her the amulet." 1 "Keep the amulet." 2

Lines.Text: My father is near. Just find the amulet and give it to me.
You got the key? Great. Now let's find my father's amulet.
I think the key must be near here somewhere.
Yes, just lead the way. It's around here somewhere.
You want to help me find my father's amulet or not?
Did you change your mind? Won't you help me find my father's amulet?
I thought I heard someone... I suppose you're here to loot? This is my own family's tomb, but I'd be willing to let you take a few things if you help me find my father's amulet.
You've been expelled, dumpling. But you can make amends, and everything will be just the way it was before.
I don't have any more business for you, dumpling, but thanks for coming to see poor, lonely Uncle Crassius.
Did you teach Banden Indarys his lesson? Is House Redoran fleeing from your wrath, sweetie?
Have you spoken with Dram Bero?
Did you find Reynel Uvirith? Is the Telvanni stronghold no longer a threat?
Have you found Velfred the Outlaw?
Odral asked you to deliver a shipment of ebony?
Have you done any more business with Odral Helvi? If he asks you to do something suspicious, keep me informed, and I will reward you, pudding.
I'm glad you stopped by, %PCName. I may have some business to discuss with you.
Yes, I see we're going to get along just splendidly, sweetie-pie. You'll go far with my support. You're now a %NextPCRank of House Hlaalu.
Come on, dumpling, don't be shy. Just do this one little favor for Uncle Crassius.
You want me to be your sponsor in House Hlaalu? I thought you'd never ask... But first, I want to see who I'm dealing with. Show Uncle Crassius what you have to offer. That's right, don't be shy.
I'm so glad to see you again, %PCName.
Yes, I'm Crassius Curio, but you can call me Uncle Crassius.
I am Vedam Dren, Duke of Vvardenfell. Welcome to Ebonheart, outlander.
I am surprised to see you here again. Do you have some business for me?
You've been expelled, %PCName. If you want to make amends, you'll have to see Crassius Curio or Nileno Dorvayn.
Did you deliver the shipment of ebony?
Do you have the rent and taxes from the farmers? Or did they hold out on you?
Did you replace the erroneous documents?
Have you found the Caldera mining contracts?
Did you deliver the sealed orders like I asked?
My name's Odral Helvi. I help keep the mines running and make sure business goes smoothly.
What brings you to Caldera, %PCName?
You've been expelled, %PCName. You need to make amends.
Did you catch the thief that's been bothering Ralen Tilvur?
Did you find the Prelude? Do you have my wakizashi?
I hope you have some good news about the ebony trade.
So what did you do about the game rats?
Did you find out what was going on at Odirniran?
Back already? I hope Tarvyn Faren made it safely to Pelagiad.
Did you get Murudius Flaeus' debt money?
Did you deliver the sealed report as I asked?
No, %PCName, I don't believe we've met. My name is Edryno Arethi. I don't have any official title, but I handle House Hlaalu's business here in Vivec.
What can I do for you today, %PCName?
You've been expelled, %PCName. Perhaps I can help you make amends.
Is the ebony trade doing better now?
Have you found the murderer of Ralen Hlaalo?
Did you deliver the orders for Bivale Teneran?
Are the alchemists buying only House Hlaalu's guar hides?
Do you have any more news of the Inanius egg mine? I heard the queen was dead.
Is the queen in the Inanius egg mine dead?
Have you acquired Aurane's alchemical formulas?
Do you have a copy of Neminda's orders? Remember the code phrase is "Orphan of Arnesia."
I am Nileno Dorvayn. I keep business going here in Balmora while the Hlaalu Councilors are away. Which is most of the time.
What business brings you here today, %PCName?
Whatever you need, Hortator.
Yes, of course %PCName, whatever you want.
What are you doing here?
You again? What do you want?
Yes, I have named you the Hlaalu Hortator. Is there anything else you need?
I've just heard the news, %PCName. Congratulations on your... negotiations with Orvas Dren. What can I do for one as influential as yourself?
Well, if you've come all this way, I suppose you can ask a few questions.
You killed my champion, Garding. Don't expect a friendly welcome.
You have my support. What else can I do for you, %PCName?
I believe you are here to ask for my support on the Council.
You are welcome in my home, Hortator.
Yes, I will name you the Hlaalu Hortator. Anything else you need?
So you've found me again? Easier than the first time, no? What are you here to discuss?
I take precautions to ensure that I am not found easily... I see I will have to take more precautions. But what can I do for you?
When we find J'Saddha, we'll make sure he never escapes again.
I'm looking for... a friend. He's a Khajiit. Goes by the name J'Saddha.
Have you seen a runaway slave near here? Goes by the name J'Saddha.
Do you want to discuss your stronghold?
Are you looking for me? Do you want to build a stronghold?
I am glad Vvardenfell finally has an Arch-Mage who cares about scholarship.
My studies are at a critical phase. I do not have any more duties for you, but I will put in a word with Arch-Mage Trebonius.
Did you find any plans or blueprints in Bethamez?
Did you find any plans or blueprints in Mzuleft?
Did you get the excavation report from Nchuleftingth?
Have you found a Dwemer Tube? Many of my studies cannot continue until I have one in my possession.
More interruptions, %PCRank? Do you want more duties? Why are you here?
Did you return Chimarvamidium?
What did you find at Huleen's hut? Was it worth all these intolerable interruptions?
Did you get Chimarvamidium?
Did you get the Detect Creatures Potion from Skink?
Well, don't just stand there. Have you found a copy of Chronicles of Nchuleft or not?
Why are you... Wait. Is that a copy of "Secrets of Dwemer Animunculi"?!
What's so important that you would interrupt my studies? If you must have duties for the Mages Guild, I suppose I could think of something.
Yes, you are the Arch-Mage now. I will help you in any way I can.
You have performed all my duties honorably. I have one more thing to ask of you...
You have done well. When you are ready for advancement, speak with me about duties again.
Have you found a copy of Galur Rithari's Papers?
Have you found the soul of an Ash Ghoul?
Did you put a stop to Telura Ulver's necromancy?
Were you able to arrange a meeting?
Have you found a copy of Vampires of Vvardenfell?
Did Tenyeminwe make it safely to the ship?
I'm at your service. Are you here for duties or advancement?
What can I do for you %PCRank?
What do you want?
Have you found the Telvanni spy?
Do the citizens of Maar Gan still have to worry about necromancy?
I am waiting for Itermerel's notes.
Have you put a stop to that unsanctioned training?
Have you convinced Llarar Bereloth to join us? Do you have Manwe's guild dues?
Have you convinced Llarar Bereloth to join us? Do you have Manwe's guild dues?
What do you want, %PCRank? Do you want more duties or not?
What does the %PCRank ask of Ajira?
Ajira is a good friend of %PCName and tells %PCName about the Warlock's Ring.
Ajira is a good friend of %PCName and tells %PCName about the Staff of Magnus.
Ajira has some duties for Ajira's good friend, %PCName.
Ajira knows that %PCName is a good friend of Ajira.
What can Ajira do for %PCName?
Has %PCName found Ajira's stolen reports?
Ajira must find her stolen reports!
Ajira must study these flowers and mushrooms. %PCName knows this. Why does %PCName pester Ajira now?
Does %PCName have flowers for Ajira?
Has %PCName put the fake soul gem in Galbedir's desk?
Has %PCName found the mushrooms Ajira needs?
What brings you to Ajira's shop? Do you want duties from Ajira? Do you want the local brews? Or help in a fight? Some Telvanni bug musk? Or a way to reach the high places?

What brings you to Ajira's shop? Do you want to try the local brews? Need something to help in a fight? Some Telvanni bug musk to bring you a mate? Or a way to get to those high places where your hands cannot reach?

Poor daughter. Dead now, all dead. Oblivion deadens us each and every one. One mistake stakes like cake crusts stalks you forever ever more. Blood? Yes, your blood. Daughter's blood. Poor Delyna. All over you. On your hands. Your pretty hands. Sheogorath whispers! Yes, I see it now! The sin on your face! Filthy! Worthless! %PCRace!

My daughter is safe. So very safe. Things will change around here. Tell Athyn I will order no more attacks on the road out front my house. He should visit me. The weather is very nice in here. Neither ash nor rain.
Daughter, my daughter, mine. Delyna Mandas. Saint Delyn, a man thus ain't. Lock it, her locket. Keep it locked up. In her pocket. Who owns that locket?

Pots and pans and bottles and cans. Furniture for my furniture. The trees have her. Fear's tower. Flowers and trees and birds and bees and for eyes myself invite. In the tower. In decision. In perfect Oblivion. Rest of Oblivion. Rest and death's leaper time.

Oh, my daughter, my daughter is gone, my daughter would you not listen? Delyna, daughter, so bold. So stupid. Bold and stupid spy. Tel Fyr that joker. Oh, father, farther I must know. No, no further. Cannot know that or bear. Llerar, sorry so sorry so, such a disaster appointment I must make. My gems are gone, my heart unguarded. These guards can't find my butterfly. Oh, madness! To thy breast I cling, suckling!
No, you killed my father. I cannot forgive you.
Thank you for rescuing me. Please take my locket to my father, Arethan Mandas.
We must travel together until we escape from this tower.
Who are you? Did my father send you? Should we travel together and get out of this place?
I will no longer claim to be the Incarnate.
Red Mountain spreads ash and blight! Sinners gather at the House! The time of the Incarnate is at hand!
Yes. I have Swamp Fever. My head is swimming and I feel terribly weak.
Ra'Virr knows why you are here. You want to buy Ra'Virr's famous Daedric weapons.
Now that I have the key, I can make an escape when the guards aren't watching.
Yes, I'm out. Thank you, %PCName.
We're making our escape now.
Percius sent you? Can you help me escape?
Tell my father, Miner Arobar, that I have escaped. Now Neloth will no longer be able to influence him.
Yes, we must travel together to the Telvanni docks.
Please help me. I am being held hostage by Master Neloth. If you can get me out of here and we travel together to the Telvanni docks, my father will reward you.
I may have jobs for you, but you might be interested in something a bit different: the Bal Molagmer.
You say you've found out what happened to my pillow shipment?
Are you the one they sent to take care of the cave rats?
Ah, my friend %PCName. How may I be of service to you?
Are you my guide from the Fighters Guild? I am sorry I went ahead on my own. Please, let us travel together back outside.
I am lost and frightened. Would you please travel together with me back outside?
Thank you for taking me to the Telvanni docks.
Are you ready to travel together to the Telvanni docks?
Are you here from the Fighters Guild? Shall we fight together against these foul Necromancers?
Greetings, %PCRank. Would you kill a brother thief in cold blood?
Did Nileno Dorvayn send you? Is that scroll for me?
Thank you for killing the Telvanni necromancer. Please, let's travel together back to Remasa Othril.
Please. Kill the necromancer and then take me back to Remasa Othril.
Yes. I'm Tongue-Toad.
Are you here to deliver the flin?
We must get Teres back, and then restore order to the Dissapla Mine.
Greetings. Are you here to help? We've been having some problems here in the Dissapla Mine.
Did Novor Drethan send you? Let's travel together back to the mine entrance.
Thanks for getting me back safely.
Guide me to the mine entrance.
Tell me when you're ready to travel together.
Are you here to guide me to Pelagiad? Just tell me if you want to travel together.
Thank you for taking me to Pelagiad. You are an excellent guide.
Yes, %PCName? We're almost there. Take me to the Halfway Tavern.
Yes, %PCName? Do we not travel together to Pelagiad?
Just get me to the Halfway Tavern in Pelagiad. Tell me when you're ready to travel together.
Oh, thank Julianos you're here! It's all my fault!
I'm so sorry. It was all my fault.
Deliver the excavation report to Edwinna in Ald'ruhn.
Did you find Anes Vendu? Did you get the excavation report?

I'm Senilias Cadiusus and this is my daughter, Pania. I am excavating these Dwemer ruins. Oh, did Edwinna send you? I'm afraid I don't have an excavation report for her. And what's this? A letter from Hasphat Antabolis? And you come recommended? How nice of Hasphat to think of us. And what a lucky coincidence.
I'm Senilias Cadiusus and this is my daughter, Pania. I am excavating these Dwemer ruins. Oh, did Edwinna send you? I'm afraid I don't have an excavation report for her.

I'm Senilias Cadiusus and this is my daughter, Pania. We are excavating these Dwemer ruins. Oh, I see you have a letter from Hasphat Antabolis. And you come recommended. Splendid. Perhaps you could help us out. Our native guide, Anes Vendu, is missing.
I'm Senilias Cadiusus and this is my daughter, Pania. We are excavating these Dwemer ruins.
You again? Are you here to help with the excavation?
Things have been pretty quiet around here. Thanks for all your help, %PCName.
I was having some trouble with bandits. Have you found anything, %PCName?
Did Neminda send you again? I've been having trouble with bandits.
Thanks for your help with the mudcrabs, %PCName. Let me know if you need anything. I've also been having some trouble with bandits.
Did you find the hostile mudcrabs?
Did Neminda send you? Are you here to help with these hostile mudcrabs?
Some hostile Mudcrabs dragged off one of my guar!
Just what I need. Another stupid Redoran.
Thank the Tribunal you're here! I've been stuck in here for days since the ash storm.
I got stuck in this tomb after the ash storm. Can we travel together back to Maar Gan?
I will continue my pilgrimage on my own. Thank you again, %PCName.
The ashlanders are dead? I wish you didn't have to kill them, but now I am free to continue to pilgrimage on my own.
You killed Manat? If you kill the other two ashlanders outside, I can make my escape.
You paid my ransom? Thank you, %PCName. I'll continue on the pilgrimages on my own.
Hey! %PCRace! I'm Beden Giladren, a poor pilgrim trapped by these ashlanders. Can you get me out of here? These ashlanders are holding me for ransom.
Nice to see you again. I'm Beden Giladren in case you forgot. Can you get me out of here? These ashlanders are holding me for ransom.
Are you here to guide me to the Koal Cave? Shall we travel together?
You must be the one the Fighters Guild sent with a new load of sujamma.
Make it quick, n'wah.
Weren't you the one who was going to deliver my ash yams? What took you so long? I've got all these kwama eggs and no ash yams because I hate ash yams.
Are you here to show me that thing you did? Or did you want to feed the spiders?
What are you here for? Are you here to feed the spiders?
Oh, it's you again.
Did you bring me the Robe of the Drake's Pride?
Whatever you want, the answer is no.
I really don't have time for any of this.
Did you bring the Amulet of Flesh Made Whole?
Are you still here?
So you've returned! Our Hortator! What do you want?
Yes, I've given you my vote as Hortator, %PCName. I just wish I could see Berel Sala's face right now.
What is this man doing here? Is it lost?
What is this man doing here? Is it lost?
Are you the new serving girl? No? Who are you, then?
What do you want?
Were you able to find the Dahrk Mezalf?
Have you found a copy of "Nchunak's Fire and Faith"?
Did you find "Antecedents of Dwemer Law"?
Do you have a copy of the book "Chronicles of Nchuleft"?
I am Baladas Demnevanni. And this, Arvs Drelen is my home. Why have you come here?
What brings you here, %PCName?
You want the Ring of Equity? I found it for you.
I bet you're here for the Amulet of Unity.
I'm still your Mouth, right? Anything I can do for you, %PCRank?
They call me "Fast Eddie." Who are you?
Glad to see you again, %PCName.
You again? What do you want?
I have not changed my mind. I do not intend for you to even be the Telvanni Hortator. Fulfill the prophecies in your next incarnation, Nerevar.
Yes, I am still taking the matter of your appointment as Telvanni Hortator under consideration.
What brings the Archmagister here?
Is Gothren dead? Have you fulfilled your duty as Magister of House Telvanni?
Is Banden Indarys no longer a threat?
Is Raynasa Rethan dead?
Have you found someone who will be your Mouth?
Have you won the fight for House Telvanni in Shishi?
Do we have enough support now to overturn the Mages Guild monopoly?
Do you have news from Odirniran?
Have your learned the rudimentary wizard spells?
Is the blight cured in the Mudan-Mul egg mine?
Have you convinced Baladas Demnevanni to join the Council?
What can I do for you, %PCRank?
What brings the Telvanni Hortator here?
Yes, I have given you my support for the title of Telvanni Hortator. You must now win the support of the other councilors. When you have done this, speak to me again.
I have heard of you, yes. You are the outlander who wishes to be the Telvanni Hortator.
Yes, %PCName. I have heard you may want to be the Telvanni Hortator.
I am Master Aryon of House Telvanni. What brings you here?
What brings you to Tel Vos, %PCName?
Are you here to discuss your stronghold?
I oversee the construction of strongholds for House Redoran. Perform your duties and perhaps someday you will need a stronghold of your own.
Are you here to discuss your stronghold?
I oversee the construction of strongholds for House Telvanni. You do not have enough rank in House Telvanni to have your own stronghold.
We fight to the death, %PCName.
You will never be the Archmaster of House Redoran. Meet me at the Arena in Vivec where I shall prove my right to rule in a duel to the death.
Meet me in the Arena in Vivec. There we will fight a duel to the death.
So you have the support of all the other councilors for the title of Redoran Hortator.
I have not changed my mind about you, outlander.
Unless you have some important business to discuss, outlander, I suggest that you leave.
Alas, %PCName. You have been expelled and there is nothing I can do for you. Perhaps if you had listed to my advice more often we would never have come to this.

No, %PCName. Before you speak another work, I must give you the sad news. You have been expelled from House Redoran. This is a terrible loss that will cause us as much anguish as it surely is causing you now. But hope is not lost. You may make amends and return to House Redoran's good graces.
What can I do for the %PCRace that rescued my daughter?

You have rescued my daughter, %PCName. I must apologize for the way I treated you. I will gladly offer my support to make you a Councilman. Please take this amulet as a sign of my support. Also take this Redoran Master Helm. All the Redoran Councilors have a Master's Helm for rituals and public appearances.
I've heard you were asking for support on the Council. I respect you personally, but I cannot give you my support.
What can I do for the Hortator of House Redoran?

I have given you my vote as the new Redoran Hortator. Have the other councilors agreed? Once they agree, you will be the Hortator of House Redoran. A heavy title, laden with tradition and responsibility. I trust one as dedicated to the eradication of Dagoth Ur as you shall use the title in a responsible manner.

You must explain why you have come here, and quickly. No speeches or excuses. Use your words with care, for I am a councilor of House Redoran and a very busy man with many duties and responsibilities. I am not one to stand about idly while others chatter on and on about the most trivial of subjects.
I am a very busy man, %PCName. I trust you will explain this reason for interrupting me yet again?

What do you want, outlander? I do not have the time or the patience to answer all your childish questions. How do you expect me to fulfill my duties to House Redoran if you keep interrupting me? My time is precious and cannot be wasted on idle chatter. Well? Speak up. And quickly or I shall have to teach you a lesson on the virtues of brevity.
You've broken our rules twice, %PCName. Is there some reason you keep pestering me?
You are no longer a member of House Redoran. You should make amends.
Did Athyn Sarethi send you to get my support on the council? I will support you, even though you are an outlander, if you help clear the beasts from Morvayn Manor.
What can I do for you, %PCRank?
What brings you here, Hortator? Why are you not in Ghostgate?
Have the other councilors seen the wisdom of naming you the Redoran Hortator?
I am Brara Morvayn, a councilor of House Redoran. Is there something I can do for you?
It is nice to see you again, %PCName. What brings you here?
What are you doing here, traitor?
You have been expelled from House Redoran, %PCName. You should make amends.
Do you have word from Nalvilie Saren?
I have another favor to ask. In my youth, I was involved with a woman named Nalvilie Saren.
I asked you to collect the taxes from Gnisis.
So you want my support on the Council. Very well, I shall grant support to an outlander, if he can prove himself. First, I need someone to collect the taxes from Gnisis.
Yes, %PCRank?
So, the Hortator returns. How goes the fight against the Sixth House?
Yes, I have agreed to name you the Redoran Hortator. What else can I do for you?
I am Hlaren Ramoran, Lord of West Gash and a councilor of House Redoran. Who, exactly, are you?
So we meet again, %PCName. What do you need from the Lord of West Gash?
You have been expelled from House Redoran. Permanently. This better be important.
You have been expelled from House Redoran. Make amends, %PCName, make amends.
Are you here to discuss the affairs of the council, %PCRank?
If you want my support to make you a Councilman, you will have to perform a great service for House Redoran. I believe the Caldera ebony mines should be shut down.
Why are you here, Hortator? Take the battle to our enemies, the Sixth House and the Empire!
I trust Athyn Sarethi's judgement. I will support you as the Redoran Hortator.
As a councilor of House Redoran, I am a very busy man. I hope this is important.
What can I do for you this time, outlander?
Have you found a solution to the madness of Arethan Mandas?
Any word on the smugglers in Shurinbaal?
Have you silenced Ondres Nerano's slanders?
Have you been able to clear my son of Bralen Carvaren's murder?
Thank you, %PCName. I am in your debt. I will do what I can to return the favor. Tell Neminda that I am safe.
You're here to guard me? Thank the Tribunal! The assassins have already taken my guards. I fear there will be more. Stay alert, %PCRace.
Yes, my son, Varvur Sarethi. You have returned him to me, and I am in your debt.
What can I do for you, %PCRank?
What can I do for you, Hortator?
I will give you my support as the Redoran Hortator. I will try to use my influence with the other councilors.
I am Athyn Sarethi, a councilor of House Redoran. What can I do for you?
Yes, %PCName. I am glad to see you again. I may have duties for you.
What brings you to my home again, %PCName?
I remember what you did for me when I was in trouble.
I am feeling much better now that the ash statue is gone.
I will go see Lloros Sarano as soon as I can.
Lloros Sarano wants to speak with me about the ash statue? Maybe he can do something about these bad dreams. I will see him as soon as I can.
I am sorry. I am not feeling well. What can I do for you?
Talk to my father, Athyn Sarethi.
Yes, we travel together back to Sarethi Manor.
Did my father send you? Are you here to rescue me? Should we travel together back to Sarethi Manor?
You... you're not Relmerea!
Who are you? Wait! That's Relmerea's helm!
You... you're not Felsen!
Who are you? Wait! That's Felsen's helm!
What can I do for you?
I don't have time to stand around talking to traitors, %PCName.
You have been expelled and must make amends.
I don't have any more duties for you, %PCName. What brings you here?
I heard there was an attack... Is Athyn Sarethi safe?
Quickly, %PCName. You must guard Athyn Sarethi.
Is Drulene Falen still having trouble with bandits?
Did you get the Founder's Helm?
Have you found out what happened to Mathis Dalobar?
Did you deliver the Cure Disease Potion to Theldyn Virith?
Have you taken care of those hostile mudcrabs?
I am Neminda, Drillmaster and Recruiter. If you wish to join House Redoran, you have come to the right place.
What can I do for you, %PCRank?
Yes, %PCName? Are you ready for more duties?
Yes, %PCName? What can I do for you?
Do you have news from Andasreth?
Did you find Fedris Tharen?
Have you found out anything more about Varvur's ash statue?
I am interested in how Varvur Sarethi found that ash statue.
If Varvur Sarethi meets with me, I will clear him of Bralen Carvaren's murder.
Yes, Athyn Sarethi said to expect someone. What can I do for you?
I am Lloros Sarano, a priest of the Temple here in Ald'ruhn and a member of House Redoran. If you need the services of a priest, speak with Methal Seran.
I am Lloros Sarano, a priest of the Temple here in Ald'ruhn and a member of House Redoran.
What brings you to the Temple, %PCName? I usually offer my services to members of House Redoran. If you need a priest, speak with Methal Seran.
What brings you to the Temple, %PCName?
No, you are a traitor to House Redoran. If you have nothing important to discuss, you should leave.
You have been expelled, %PCName, and must make amends.
Is the Hlaalu lord Raynasa Rethan dead?
Is Telvanni Reynel Uvirith dead?
Have you slain Dagoth Tanis?
Did you convince Rothis Nethan to appear for the duel?
Do you have the treasures of the Redas Tomb?
Have you convinced Meril Hlaano to stop his slanders against our House?
I am Faral Retheran. The House Redoran steward here in Vivec.
What can I do for you, %PCRank?
What can I do for you, %PCName? Are you interested in duties for House Redoran? I may have a few.
What can I do for you, %PCName?
Were you able to get Giras Indaram's armor repair debts?
Did my son arrive safely at the Koal Cave?
I am Tuveso Beleth, and this is my son, Deval. I am a smith of House Redoran.
Hello again, %PCName. What can I do for you?
Are the cultists in Ashalmawia dead?
Do you have the Shishi report?
Did you take care of the kagouti den on the Gnisis-Ald'ruhn road?
Did you take care of that shalk in the Ashimanu Mine?
Is Old Blue Fin finally dead?
Yes, I'm Theldyn Virith. Sort of the Hetman of Ald Velothi.
What brings you back to Ald Velothi, %PCName?
I knew I could beat that coward.
Stand aside, %PCName. Let me at this coward.
I won the duel. I can't believe I won.
Not now, %PCName.
Are you here about that duel?
You have killed my captors, and I am grateful. I can find my own way from here.
I cannot leave, not while my captors still live.
Is that my glove?
Together we will work to end slavery in Vvardenfell.
Yes, it's a shame so many people cannot read.
I am Ilmeni Dren, daughter of Duke Vedam Dren. Who are you and what are you doing here?
Yes, %PCName?
Have you completed the Pilgrimage to Maar Gan?
Have you cleansed Hassour of the cultists?
Have you chastised the False Incarnate?
Have you shown compassion to Bulfim gra-Shugarz?
Have you cleansed the cult of Ihinipalit?
Have you found the Shoes of St. Rilms?
Obviously you have failed your pilgrimage to the Sanctus Shrine.
Have you completed the pilgrimage to the Sanctus Shrine?
Did you convince Tanusea Veloth to leave Vivec City?
Have you cleansed the vampires from Galom Daeus?
Is the Necromancer Delvam Andarys no longer a threat to the Temple?
Have you made the Pilgrimage to Mount Kand?
Did you cure Lette?
Have you found the Crosier of St. Llothis?
Did you find the Cleaver of St. Felms the Bold?
Have you found the Hair Shirt in Lost Kogoruhn?
Did you find the hermit Sendas Sathis and deliver his food and drink?
Were you able to cure Assantus Hansar?
What brings you to the Temple, %PCRank? Have you been lax in your duties?
Well, I'm here in Pelagiad. You better tell Edryno Arethi that I made it here safely.
We're going to travel together to Pelagiad, right?
You here to take me to Pelagiad? Tell me when you're ready to travel together.
%Name is here now. %Name is safe. Galyn will protect %Name.
Yes, we travel together. Watch out for the slavehunters.
Did the Arvels send you? %Name will travel together with you back to Galyn Arvel's ship.
No, get away. Don't tell anyone %Name is here.
Are you here to rescue me? Do you want to travel together back to the cave entrance?

You got me this far. I can swim the rest of the way to Gnaar Mok once I've rested a bit. From there I'm taking the first ship back to Hammerfell. I wish I could thank you for rescuing me, but the bandits took everything I had.
Shall we travel together?
Thank you for curing me, %PCName.
Please help me. I feel ill.
Thank you for curing me, %PCName.
Please. Leave me alone. I am not feeling well. I am diseased. You should go unless you want to catch it.
You have dealt with my captors. I will find my own way back to the Erabinimsun and continue to teach them of the Empire and its ways.
You have dealt with my captors. I will find my own way back to the Erabinimsun and continue to teach them of the Empire and its ways.
I dare not leave until these outcast Erabinimsun have been dealt with.
I am Drinar Varyon of the famous Varyon family.
Hainab stole my pants!
Meet me in the arena.
What can I do for you, %PCRank?

Interesting. This letter says that I am to make you the Arch-Mage and retire. I do not know why Ocato would lose his faith in me, but I will do as he asks. But I will watch over you, %PCName, and make sure you do not betray the high principles of the Mages Guild.
Oh? Well, what do you want, then?
What? You have a letter for me? Well, hand it over.
Are you here to challenge my position in the Guild? Do you think you have what it takes to be the Arch-Mage?
Greetings, %PCName. I am Arch-Mage Trebonius, Guildmaster of Vivec.
You've been expelled, %PCName. Are you here to make amends?
What can I do for you, %PCRank?
Yes, I remember you, but do you remember me? I am Arch-Mage Trebonius Artorius and head of the Guild of Mages here in Vvardenfell.
Oh, hello! I see you've found Paur! Please, allow me to give you some reward for your efforts.
What is it, %PCName? Have you completed the sensitive matters we discussed?
Greetings. Perhaps you can be of some help to me. There are sensitive matters to attend to.
You help me escape. Go tell Darius that I am okay.
Hey! Baladas Demnevanni locked me up in here. Can you get me out?
Tell me what you have found, you who have seen in my visions. Have you found the white guar?
Greetings, dark walker. What brings you to my home? Have you come to rid me of this unlife?
Greetings, dark walker. What brings you to my home? Have you come to rid me of this unlife?
Rabinna thanks you.
Rabinna will find her way to safety. Though Im-Kilaya is dead, someone will help.
Rabinna will find her way to safety. She will stay in this place and find one who will help.
Rabinna will find her way to safety. She will stay in this place and find one who will help.
You wish that we travel together?
You wish that we travel together?
[The slave is too frightened to talk to you.]
It is good that man, Vorar Helas, is dead. He would have had Rabinna killed for the drugs in my stomach. Thank you again. You are Rabinna's only hope of escape.
You have taken Rabinna from Relam Arinith. My fate is sealed.
[The slave is too frightened to talk to you.]
Have you come seeking me? My name is unimportant, and my accomplishments are few.
Stranger, I believe you are the one I have seen in my dreams and visions.
Have you gotten the money for that woman's family heirlooms yet?
Have you gotten the money for that woman's family heirlooms yet?

I see that you were taken in by that bounty hunter. Fear not. It is not uncommon for them to come looking here. I thank you for your help, and for your intentions. Here, take this. It is a small token of my gratitude. May it serve you well.
Leave me alone, stranger.
Shall we continue to travel together, great friend?
Excuse me, master, can you help me...please? I fear I am lost without your help. Please, can you aid a poor Argonian?
Excuse me, mistress, can you help me...please? I fear I am lost without your help. Please, can you aid a poor Argonian?
Hey, it's you! What do I want with you again?
Greetings. You should take care while in these parts. There are murderous outlaws about. No telling what might happen to an unwary traveler.
You gonna go give him that note or what? He can't hide forever! Go on!
You got a note from Bugrol to me? Where that fool get himself? He not smart like me, you know.
What you mean you not give Bashuk my note? I can't hide forever! Get going!
Good, you back! You got a note from Bashuk? Gimme!
Listen up, if you really care. My former "guards" just ran off and stole all my goods.
If you know what's good for you, %PCRace, you'll leave me alone and be on your way.
Okay, statue all built. Hope you have fun with new one. Shame to get rid of old Khartag Rock, but it cause some problems anyway. Big rock.
What you need now?
Greetings, friend. Interested in doing some business?
Who...who are you? You go now! Leave me alone. I must get home now.
My husband Drerel is dead? No! I can't speak about this anymore.
Please, can you help me? My husband and I were traveling through here, and we were attacked by a pack of wild nix hounds.
Falanu is dead? No! I can't speak about this anymore.
You've spoken to Falanu? Then she's alive! Let's get back to her quickly!
You. Stranger. Please, can you help me? While traveling with my wife, we were set upon by a pack of wild nix hounds!
Hello, %PCName. I feel much better now. Things aren't as muddled.
Hello, stranger. What? What the hell are you looking at? Get the hell out of here before I take your head off! All I want to do is catch some slaughterfish. Is that so wrong? Huh? You're welcome!
What is it? Do I know you? Well? Slaughterfish!
Ahh...my axe. It will be good to cleave some skulls once again!
I'll get Widowmaker back from that witch!!! I pluck out her eyes and wear them as earrings!!
Hail, stranger! Have you seen a witch nearby? I'll tear out her heart and feed it to a nix hound!
Well, do your magic, outlander! Cast your spell to Cure Disease! Or have you found a potion of Cure Common Disease?
Damned witches!!!
You! You will speak with me now, or you shall feel the bite of my axe! When this enchantment wears off, Hisin Deep-Raed will shed some blood!
Take care, %PCRace, there are thieving Ashlanders about. A couple of them just robbed me of my guar hide shipment bound for Tel Aruhn.
I must meet my partner as soon as possible.
If there's anything I can ever do for you, I would be happy to. Soon, I will be with Nelos, and all will be well.
I must find that bandit! I believe he's in Pelagiad. Perhaps he'll come back to find me, though....
Begging your pardon. Have you seen a bandit nearby? I must find him!
I can't believe those damned Ashlanders would take my hides! Dirty fetchers, all of them.
Stranger! Yes, you! Please, can you help me? I've been attacked by a couple of bastard Ashlanders who robbed me and left me for dead.
Have you recovered my family heirlooms?
Excuse me. Can you help me? I've been robbed by some notorious thieves!
Please, let us travel together until we find my husband.
It's good to be out of the hands of those cultists.
I just want to find my husband.
Sason has sent you? Thank you! I'll follow you out of here.
You! You don't look like another one of these cultists. Please, you must help me get out of here, before they perform whatever unholy ritual they've got planned for me!
I can't believe she's gone. What will I do without her?
Thank you again for your help.

Thank the gods you've found her! I can only imagine what those bastards had planned for my Malexa. Please, take your reward, and I'll make sure to let House Redoran know of the service you've performed for me today. Thank you again!
I must find my wife.
Please, can you help me? My wife has been taken by cultists!
Your help was appreciated, friend of Rasha.
Must get fine shirts to marketplace.
You swore by Zenithar you would deliver my shirts. Please, go now. I have given you the shirt from my back, and must have that delivery.
Greetings, traveler. Rasha wishes you well and thinks you maybe can help him with some pressing business.
Greetings, %PCRank. Might you help a brother in need?

Damn! Where is that guy? He made me promise to meet me here with these goods, and now he's late. I'm a busy man! You wouldn't by any chance be heading toward Ald'ruhn, would you? Maybe you could do me a favor.
It is good to finally be at my destination.
I must get to Koal Cave soon.
Pardon me, can you help a poor pilgrim?
Good that I'm finally here. Thanks for your help.
I've got to get my stuff to Gnaar Mok.

Well, this is close enough. Thanks for your help. I suppose it's only fair that I give you your reward. Here, take them. Though it pains me to give them, you are now the owner of the Boots of Blinding Speed.
Hey there! Yes, you. Interested in a making a deal?
Shall we travel together to the shop? It'll be lonely without Rollie, but we'll make it!
Well, shall we travel together to our destination?
I've really got to get my goods to Vivec. It's not cheap trying to feed old Rollie!
Pardon me! You look like you could use some extra cash. Perhaps you could be of some use to Rollie and me.
You there! Yes, you. I'm in need of an escort. You'll do in a pinch.
You are of no more use to me. Be on your way.
You there! Yes, you. I'm in need of an escort. You'll do in a pinch.
It's good to be away from those kagouti, though they're really marvelous beasts. Did you notice the coloration? And the larger one was a real ripper!
My sorrow is too great to speak anymore.
I'll find my own way back, thank you.
I'll find my own way back, thank you.
It will be good to get back to Thoronor and continue our travels.
It will be good to get back to Thoronor and continue our travels.

Ahhh...you've gotten rid of those kagouti. A shame, really. They're simply fascinating creatures. Well...when they're not trying to devour you. I suppose we should be on our way, then. Thoronor should be just west of here.
Please, let's head back to my friend as quickly as we can. The spell has worn off, but hopefully we'll make it back without difficulty.
Please, get rid of those kagouti! There were two of them, I believe. Two gorgeous kagouti...such wonderful mannerisms...such fascinating calls.
Oh, thank heavens you found me! I don't know what I would have done if you hadn't shown up. I've been trapped here by some kagouti since my friend and I were separated.
Oh, thank heavens you found me! I don't know what I would have done if you hadn't shown up. I've been trapped here by some kagouti since my friend and I were separated.
Hello again. I'm afraid my travels will have to continue without dear Edras. It will simply not be the same.
Hello again. It'll be time to continue my travels soon.
Ah...you've found my friend Edras! Wonderful!
I really must find my friend Edras.
Hello! Please, might you be of some assistance? My friend is lost, and I'm very worried about him.
It is good to finally be here. Thank you for your help, my friend.
Yes, %PCName? Shall we travel together to the Fields of Kummu?
Hello! Please, can you help me? I've lost my way, and cannot find the holy place for which I am searching.
I am Enar Releth, the Mouth of the new Council member, Baladas Demnevanni.
Have you found the plans in Nchuleft?
Did you ask Baladas Demnevanni the three questions?
I am Mallam Ryon, the Mouth of Archmagister Gothren.
Have you put down the slave rebellion?
Did you bring Mistress Therana her new clothes?
I am Felisa Ulessen, the Mouth for Mistress Therana.
Have you found the Staff of the Silver Dawn?
Do you have the Sload Soap?
I am Arara Uvulas, the Mouth of Master Neloth.
Did you deliver the Daedra skin to Master Ayron?
Did you deliver the Cure Blight potion?
Have you delivered the coded message to Divayth Fyr?
I am Galos Mathendis, the Mouth of Master Aryon.
Did you find the Black Jinx?
Do you have the muck?
I am Raven Omayn, Mouth of Mistress Dratha.
What brings you here, %PCRank?
What brings you here, %PCName? Do you want chores?
What you need now? Very busy here. Big rock, you know!
Hey, you. You're not one of them townbosses, right? How about you help me? Huh? I'll give you a present.
You should not be here. Please go.
You should not be here. Please go.
Hello, my dear. Nels Llendo at your service.
Greetings, my friend! It is I, Nels Llendo.
All sorts of things. All sorts of things. Spoons, knives, and forks. The master puts them here for play. Do you play? What is your game? The netch is hiding, but I will not look.
So, you have come. I see you serve the master. He is good, oh yes. Good to me. You have come seeking; tell me what you will find.
J'Dhannar will read this book you gave him. Thank you again. And thank Ahnassi, and tell her... goodbye.
You again? What do you want?
What do you want?
Hail and well met stranger!  As ye can plainly see, I require some assistance if ye be kind enough to grant it. I need help finding the festering witch who has robbed me blind and left me for dead.
Seems a bit chilly today, doesn't it?
Hello there stranger, I see you've already met my good friend Hlormar. My name is Sosia Caristiana, the healer. How can I be of assistance to the two of you?
Go away, outlander.
Don't push your luck, mister.
I'm Beldrose Dralor, treasurer of House Redoran. And, if you will excuse me, I am a very busy man.
Sorry. I can't speak to you now.

Welcome, adventurer. Looking for an Equalizer? Something to give you an edge against a superior opponent? When you need to do a lot of damage in a hurry, you can't beat a poisoned blade. Try my inexpensive Iron Spider Dagger and Steel Spider Blade, or an Imperial Netch Blade for even more bite.
Please. I am afraid. Do not tell. I am hiding.
Greetings, %PCName. I need someone to deliver my apologies for me, and you look like you have a way with words.
How can I help you?
I'm in here for some sort of blasphemy or something. Did it all right. Guild says serve your time, and keep your yap shut. So I'm being a good boy, and staying quiet.
I'm fine. Food's okay.
Nothing to do with me, mate. Ain't shiftin'. Did the crime, and doin' me time.
Told ya, mate. Nothin' doin'.
Damnfool meddling priests! I wouldn't have touched her if she hadn't come on to me like a hot sow. Bastards! Get my hands on one, I'm going to squeeze him like a pimple.
Oh, don't get me started. Just gets me in a lather.

I'm thinking, it's a lot safer in here with Ordinators not mad at me than it would be with me out there with Ordinators mad at me. They're a rough bunch. Mad with me is not how I want to be dealing with them.
You go ahead, do what you're doing. I'm minding my own business.
I'm Larrius Varro, Legion Champion of Fort Moonmoth. I've been hoping you might come by. I've got some work for you, if you're interested.
Hello, %PCName. I'm happy to say that I don't have any work for you right now. We seem to have things under control right now. Thanks to you.
Yes? Is this about that work I mentioned?
No. I dint do it. I dint do nuthin'. I was framed. I wasn't nowhere near the place. And what would I be doin', working on them silly pilgrims? Ain't worth the sweat, the tight little prigs.
Nah. I'm not interested in tanglin' with the Goldies. Get me nice clothes all fussed. And maybe an artery or two. Not a smart move.
I'm sorry. No pilgrims allowed in the Ministry. I'll have to ask you to leave... but... you're not here to visit anyone, are you?
I'm sorry. No pilgrims allowed in the Ministry. I'll have to ask you to leave.
Yes. %PCName. My friend Ahnassi has told me about you. Any friend of Ahnassi's is a friend of mine.
Welcome, %PCName. Welcome, Urshilaku Nerevarine. I have only these few humble items to offer you.
Welcome, %PCName. Welcome, Urshilaku Nerevarine. I have only these few humble items to offer you.
Welcome, outlander. I have a few humble items to offer for sale. Or, perhaps, there is something you wish to discuss?
Thank you, %PCName. You have made a safe place for the Ahemmusa. You have our gratitude, and our support.
Thank you, %PCName. You have made a safe place for the Ahemmusa. You have our gratitude, and our support.
Some say you are the Nerevarine. I hope that is true, and that you can find us a safe place.
If you have come to steal, we have nothing, outlander. If you have come to fight, then kill us, and be done with it. But if you are the Nerevarine, please, find a safe place for the Ahemmusa.
If you have come to steal, we have nothing, outlander. If you have come to fight, then kill us, and be done with it.
Thank you, %PCName. You have made a safe place for the Ahemmusa. You have my thanks, and my support.
Thank you, %PCName. You have made a safe place for the Ahemmusa. You have my thanks, and my support.
If you are the Nerevarine, then you will find a safe place for the Ahemmusa.

You are %PCName. We have heard some say you are the Nerevarine. For a long time the Ashlanders have heard of the Nerevarine prophecies. Perhaps some would say the Ahemmusa are bitter. But talk gives us no comfort.
Yes, outlander. I am Dutadalk, gulakhan of the Ahemmusa Ashlanders. Why are you here? What do you want?
You have found a safe place for the Ahemmusa. I don't know what signs others may need, but I have my proof. Thank you, Nerevarine. You shall have the support of the Ahemmusa.
You have found a safe place for the Ahemmusa. I don't know what signs others may need, but I have my proof. Thank you, Nerevarine. You shall have the support of the Ahemmusa.
You claim to be the Nerevarine? Then find a safe place for the Ahemmusa. That would be proof enough for me.
Who are you? What do you want?
Yes, outlander. I am Kausi, gulakhan of the Ahemmusa Ashlanders. Why are you here? What do you want?
It's you again. So. You want to know the trade goods wanted among the Zainab? I can tell you what I think.
I am Ashur-Dan. I am the trader here at Zainab camp. So. You want to know the trade goods wanted among the Zainab. I can tell you what I think.

You have slain one of the peace-loving Erabenimsun. You deserve to die. Though we have no champion to bring us justice, we still have our pride. We will not treat with you, even though you threaten to murder us, too.
I shall always be grateful, Nerevarine. I will try to be a good ashkhan to the Erabenimsun.
I thank you for your lessons, %PCName. I shall become ashkhan of the Erabenimsun. And I will name you Nerevarine.
No matter what Manirai says, I'm not interested. I don't want to be ashkhan.
I don't care. I don't want to be a gulakhan, anyway.
No matter what Manirai says, I'm not interested. You're just going to get me killed.
I don't want to discuss it.
I don't care. Go away. Leave me alone.

Welcome, %PCName, to the Festival Slave Market, the finest slaves in Vvardenfell!  I'm Savile Imayn, and I know we have the slave for you. Are you looking for standard household slaves, %PCName, or are you looking for something special?
[Falura Llervu looks down at the ground waiting for you to speak.]
[The slave looks down at the ground waiting for you to speak.]
Yes, thank you, sera. He is a very fine man, and I am very happy.
Yes, sera?
The Ahemmusa owe you great thanks, Nerevarine, and wish you well.

I said I would accompany you, %PCName, to see if you had made Ald Daedroth safe for the Ahemmusa. You have fulfilled my conditions. Thank you, %PCName. The Ahemmusa shall be saved. And if you wish, now I shall name you Nerevarine of the Ahemmusa.
Yes, %PCName. Are you ready now for me to accompany you to Ald Daedroth?
Have you made a safe place for the Ahemmusa? Or is there something else you want?
Have you given courtesy first to my gulakhans? No? Have you no manners? Go. Do what you should before I will speak with you.

So you have recovered the Amulet of Ashamanu. Urshamusa Rapli told me of her vision. And now you are come. You have done the tribe a great service. But perhaps you may do us a greater service yet. I have heard of an outlander who seeks to fulfill the Nerevarine prophecies, and to be named Nerevarine. Are you that outlander.

So you have recovered the Amulet of Ashamanu. Urshamusa Rapli told me of her vision. And now you are come. You have done the tribe a great service. But perhaps you may do us a greater service yet. I have heard of an outlander who seeks to fulfill the Nerevarine prophecies, and to be named Nerevarine. Are you that outlander.
I have heard of an outlander who seeks to fulfill the Nerevarine prophecies, and to be named Nerevarine. Are you that outlander?
Why do you trouble us, outlander? We have nothing worth taking. Why don't you leave us alone?
You wish to ask me about the trade goods wanted by the Zainab. Ask, and I shall answer.
I am %Name, wise woman of the Zainab. Do you come for my services, or my counsel?
Do you seek a wise woman's services, or her counsel?
You have slain one of my people. You must pay with your life.
You are the outlander who claims to fulfill the Nerevarine prophecies. What do you want?
You are stupid, outlander.
What do you want, outlander?
Go away. I do not wish to soil my yurt with your blood.

You have slain one of the peace-loving Erabenimsun. You deserve to die. Though we have no champion to bring us justice, we still have our pride. We will not treat with you, even though you threaten to murder us, too.
I am Manirai, wise woman of the Erabenimsun. You are the outlander who claims to fulfill the Nerevarine prophecies. Do you need my services? Or do you seek my counsel?
Yes, Nerevarine? Do you need my services? Or do you seek my counsel?
You have persuaded Han-Ammu to be our ashkhan? And to name you Erabenimsun Nerevarine? Then I must give you the Seizing of the Erabenimsun.
Yes, outlander? Do you need my services? Or do you seek my counsel?
I am %Name, wise woman of the Erabenimsun. Do you need my services? Or do you seek my counsel?
Yes, outlander? Do you need my services? Or do you seek my counsel?
Ah. You understand me a bit, yes? Hello, %PCName. Yakum greet you. Bless and be blessed. Speak Old Elf, yes, so Yakum learn. You know Ashlanders, yes, a little. Yakum is Ashlander.
Again, hello, %PCName. Bless and be blessed.
Ah. You understand me a bit, yes? Hello, %PCName. Yakum greet you. Bless and be blessed. Speak Old Elf, yes, so Yakum learn. You know Ashlanders, yes, a little. Yakum is Ashlander.
Again, hello, %PCName. Bless and be blessed.
What. Yakum. Me? Speak Ashland. Not speak so good Old Elf. Sorry?
Hello. Yakum. Speak Ashland. Old Elf, not so good speak.
What do you think you're doing in here? Go away. Now.
Are you an idiot? I told you. Go away. Now.
Welcome back to the Halfway. Were you here for food or beds? Or was it the Thieves Guild you wanted to talk about?
Food and beds. Or both, at the same time. Heh-heh. Your choice.
What do you want?

I hear you took care of that Sixth House base in Gnaar Mok. That was quite courageous, considering the risks. I'm sorry I've no time to talk, but things are getting out of hand here, with the rumors of corprus disease and the Sleeper attacks. But any help you can give us in finding and cleaning out Sixth House bases will be greatly appreciated.
