I'm Raesa Pullia, Champion of the Legion garrison here at Buckmoth Legion Fort. And you're %PCName. Caius Cosades sent you, didn't he? Caius says you're the one to handle this Sixth House base near Gnaar Mok.
Hello, %PCName. Did you want to talk some more about the Sixth House base in near Gnaar Mok?
I'm Raesa Pullia, Champion of the Legion garrison here at Buckmoth Legion Fort. I'm very busy right now, so please excuse me.
I'm very busy right now, so if you'll excuse me....
%PCName? I'm Master Gilvas Barelo, the abbot of Holamayan Monastery. Thank you for helping Mehra Milo. She says you are interested in 'lost prophecies.' I believe we can help you.
I'm Vevrana Aryon, a monk of Holamayan. I can arrange for your return to Vivec whenever you are ready.

I'm Vevrana Aryon, a monk of Holamayan. The monastery is here, on this island. Take the stone pathway north from the docks and the path uphill. The entrance is hidden by a magical shield. Wait or rest at the head of the path, and the portal will open at dusk and dawn only, the magical twilight hours sacred to Azura. Mehra Milo has told us of your coming. You can find her in the library with Master Barelo. Later, I can arrange for your return to Vivec whenever you are ready.
I'm looking for a friend of mine, a female Khajiit named Addhiranirr. Do you know where I can find her?
Remember. Don't tell her you talked to me.
It's no problem, really. Maybe I'll run into her back on the mainland.
Yes. As I said, I'm looking for a friend of mine, a female Khajiit named Addhiranirr. I thought you might be able to tell me where to find her.
Yes. So you want Addhiranirr to tell you about the Nerevarine? Or about the Sixth House cult? Or about the Thieves Guild? Or anything else?

All right. All right. I am still mad, and think you are stupid to tell that taxman where to find Addhiranirr. But since you are a friend of Caius, and Addhiranirr owes Caius a favor, I will tell you what you want to know about the Sixth House cult. And Addhiranirr knows nothing about the Nerevarine, but Addhiranirr is happy to tell you that, too, if it makes Caius happy.

All right. All right. Addhiranirr takes your gold for your apology. Addhiranirr is still mad, and thinks you are stupid to tell that taxman where to find Addhiranirr. But since you are a friend of Caius, and Addhiranirr owes Caius a favor, Addhiranirr will tell you what you want to know about the Sixth House cult. And Addhiranirr knows nothing about the Nerevarine, but Addhiranirr is happy to tell you that, too, if it makes Caius happy.
That would be nice. If you HAD three hundred gold.
Your apology is no good to Addhiranirr.

You! You are the one who tells the Census and Excise agent where to find Addhiranirr! Thank you very much. And now Addhiranirr does NOT feel like talking to you about the Nerevarine, or the Sixth House cult, or anything else at all. Because why? Because you are an idiot. And, yes, also, because you are a big rat, and Addhiranirr does not like big rats.
Scripts: Choice "Apologize." 1 "Offer 300 gold to help pay taxes." 2

Lines.Text: You have some nerve, and also some great stupidity, to think you can do Addhiranirr the favor of selling her out to a Census and Excise agent, and then think Addhiranirr will tell you about the Nerevarine, or the Sixth House cult, or anything else.
Scripts: Choice "Apologize." 1 "Offer 300 gold to help pay taxes." 2

Lines.Text: Yes. So you want Addhiranirr to tell you about the Nerevarine? Or about the Sixth House cult? Or about the Thieves Guild? Or anything else?

So. Are you the one Addhiranirr must thank for getting rid of the annoying Census and Excise agent? Indeed, Addhiranirr is very glad to see you, and very happy to tell a friend of my good friend Caius all about the Sixth House cult. And Addhiranirr knows nothing about the Nerevarine, but Addhiranirr is happy to tell you that, too, if it makes Caius happy. Ask away, friend %PCName.

So. Are you the one Addhiranirr must thank for getting rid of the annoying Census and Excise agent? Indeed, Addhiranirr is very glad to see you, and very happy to tell a friend of my good friend Caius all about the Sixth House cult. And Addhiranirr knows nothing about the Nerevarine, but Addhiranirr is happy to tell you that, too, if it makes Caius happy. Ask away, friend %PCName.

Great. So Caius says to you, "Speak with Addhiranirr." And you have done this thing. You are speaking with Addhiranirr. But Addhiranirr will not talk to you about the Nerevarine or the Sixth House cult, and because why? Because Addhiranirr is, at this moment, very distracted by a nice Census and Excise agent, who also wants to speak with her.
So, Addhiranirr has already said she does not want to talk to you about the Nerevarine or the Sixth House cult, as long as her mind is distracted by the Census and Excise agents looking for her.
Go away. %Name does not want to talk.
Yes. You've been quite helpful. And if there's more you want to know, please ask.
Again? Is this about the errand you are doing for me?

No. No interruptions! How many times.... Oh. You are one of Caius' associates? That is a different matter. Caius and I have a very satisfactory arrangement, and I'm sure we can come to some sort of agreement, if you will complete a little errand for me.
I CANNOT think with all these interruptions. PLEASE leave me alone.
What? Are you DEAF? No interruptions! I can't think!
Oh, go away, will you.
Hey, look. It's none of my business. Folks want to talk to a filthy lizard, it's their problem, not mine. Got out of here. And good riddance.
Am I talking to you, fetcher? No. I am talking to the filthy lizard. So push off.
Fine, he wants a filthy lizard in here, I don't care. We'll leave him alone.
Hey, look. It's none of my business. Folks want to talk to a filthy lizard, it's their problem, not mine. Got out of here. And good riddance.
Go ahead. Keep talking. And I'm gonna pop your head off, and feed it to the filthy lizard.
I'm not interested, fetcher.
I said, I'm not interested, fetcher.
Go away.
All right. All right. Who gives a damn about a filthy lizard, anyway. Get out of here. We won't bother you.
Shut up and butt out, outlander. It's the filthy lizard we're talking to, not you.
Okay, outlander. You made your point. We'll leave him alone. Get out of here before I change my mind.
All right. All right. Who gives a damn about a filthy lizard, anyway. Get out of here. We won't bother you.
I'm not talking to you, mate. I'm talking to this here filthy lizard. So shut up, or I'll shut you up.
Go away. I got nothing to say to you.
Look. Just leave me alone.
Just leave me alone, n'wah.
Fine. It's just a filthy lizard, anyway, nothing to get upset about. We'll leave him alone. Go on. Get out, before we change our minds.
Get out of our way, n'wah. We got issues with this filthy lizard here.
Whatever you say, pilgrim. Just let it ride. We'll leave him alone.
Fine. It's just a filthy lizard, anyway, nothing to get upset about. We'll leave him alone. Go on. Get out, before we change our minds.
If you don't get lost, I'm gonna hit you AND that filthy lizard so hard that when you finally hit the ground, your clothes'll be outta style.
I don't care, n'wah. Just leave me alone.
Hello again, %PCName. I trust I find you well. Is there anything else you'd like to ask about?
I've told you what I know about the Nerevarine cult. I hope Caius finds it helpful. Is there anything else you'd like to ask about?

Yes, thank you very much. We should be free from distraction here. Now, I said I'd tell you about the Nerevarine cult so you can report back to Caius. And I don't know of any Sixth House cult, but I can tell you what I do know.
Are we ready to travel together to Jobasha's Rare Books? When we arrive at my friend's bookstore, I will answer your questions there.
Are we ready to travel together to Jobasha's Rare Books? When we arrive at my friend's bookstore, I will answer your questions there.
Yes, %PCName. We travel together to Jobasha's Rare Books. When we arrive at my friend's bookstore, I will answer your questions there.

I welcome you as the friend of my friend, %PCName. But I wish to go to my friend's bookstore, and these troublesome fools are in my way. I have tried to persuade them, but they hate my race, and I fear there will be violence. Perhaps if you speak with them... but be careful... and be ready.
Yes, %PCName. I am sorry for all the trouble. If you don't mind, I'd like to go to my friend's bookstore. There I can answer all your questions.

Yes, %PCName. I simply wish to go to my friend's bookstore, but these troublesome fools are trying to threaten me. They hate my race, and I think they are spoiling for a fight. Perhaps you can speak with them, and persuade them to leave us alone. I warn you... say the wrong thing, and they may attack us both.
I'm sorry, but I cannot speak with you. I am preoccupied with my own affairs.
As I said, I cannot speak with you. I am busy. Please leave me alone.
Hello, %PCName. Was there something further you wanted to ask about?
Hello again, %PCName. What do you want? You already gave me the Dwemer puzzle box. Don't you remember?
So. Have you done that little favor I asked?
Good day, %PCName. So you're with Caius, eh? And Caius wants information? Of course, there's a this-for-that involved. I require a favor first, and then I'll tell you what you want to know.

Good day, %PCName. I am %Name, Drillmaster for the Balmora Fighters Guild. So you're with Caius, eh? And Caius wants some information? I'd be happy to help... though I will require a favor first. Then I'll tell you what you want to know.
So. Caius sent you? If you want something from me, I require a favor first, or forget it.
I am %Name, Drillmaster for the Balmora Fighters Guild. I offer training to the public, and, at a considerable discount, to members of the Fighters Guild.
I am %Name, Drillmaster for the Balmora Fighters Guild. I offer training to the public, and, at a considerable discount, to members of the Fighters Guild.
What do you want? I'm a Drillmaster, if it's training you're looking for.
Go ahead.
The Necromancer Daris Adram is dead, %PCName. Thank you for your assistance. The battle would have been difficult without you. I will stay here and take care of a few details. Thank you again.
The Necromancer Daris Adram is dead. We have done what we came to do. I will stay here and take care of a few details. Thank you again.
Shall we fight together against the foul Necromancers of Vas?
I can arrange for your return to Vivec whenever you are ready.
I can arrange for your return to Vivec whenever you are ready. But first you should speak with Mehra Milo and Master Barelas at the monastery,
I'm sorry, but I cannot speak with you. I must continue my private devotions.
Yes. I'm Blatta Hateria. Do I know you?
Do I know you? Were you thinking you might want to go fishing?
One day's pretty much like another to me. But you suit yourself.
Yup. Fishing's a little slow. Weather's been a bit warm.

You broke the rules. The rules are simple. Don't steal from the Blades. Don't attack the Blades. Break the rules, and you're out of the Blades. Forever. Get out of here. And don't come back.

[This path to your destiny is blocked.]

WHAT?! Divayth Fyr is DEAD? And you were responsible? He was your only hope for a cure for corprus. Get OUT OF HERE! And don't come back! I don't CARE what the Emperor wants! I don't CARE about your excuses! GET OUT OF HERE! 

[This path to your destiny is blocked.]

WHAT?! Raesa Pullia, the Champion of Fort Buckmoth, is DEAD? And you were responsible? Get OUT OF HERE! And don't come back! I don't CARE what the Emperor wants! I don't CARE about your excuses! GET OUT OF HERE! 

[This path to your destiny is blocked.]

WHAT?! The Urshilaku ashkhan Sul-Matuul is DEAD? And you were responsible? Now Nibani Maesa will never speak with you. Get OUT OF HERE! And don't come back! I don't CARE what the Emperor wants! I don't CARE about your excuses! GET OUT OF HERE! 

[This path to your destiny is blocked.]

WHAT?! The Urshilaku wise woman Nibani Maesa is DEAD? And you were responsible? Now Sul-Matuul will never speak with you. Get OUT OF HERE! And don't come back! I don't CARE what the Emperor wants! I don't CARE about your excuses! GET OUT OF HERE! 

[This path to your destiny is blocked.]

WHAT?! The Urshilaku gulakhan Zabamund is DEAD? And you were responsible? Now Sul-Matuul and Nibani Maesa will never speak with you. Get OUT OF HERE! And don't come back! I don't CARE what the Emperor wants! I don't CARE about your excuses! GET OUT OF HERE! 

[This path to your destiny is blocked.]

WHAT?! Hassour Zainsubani is DEAD? And you were responsible? Get OUT OF HERE! And don't come back! I don't CARE what the Emperor wants! I don't CARE about your excuses! GET OUT OF HERE! 

[This path to your destiny is blocked.]

WHAT?! Mehra Milo is DEAD? And you were responsible? Get OUT OF HERE! And don't come back! I don't CARE what the Emperor wants! I don't CARE about your excuses! GET OUT OF HERE! 

[This path to your destiny is blocked.]

WHAT?! Huleeya is DEAD? And you were responsible? Get OUT OF HERE! And don't come back! I don't CARE what the Emperor wants! I don't CARE about your excuses! GET OUT OF HERE! 

[This path to your destiny is blocked.]

WHAT?! Addhiranirr is DEAD? And you were responsible? Get OUT OF HERE! And don't come back! I don't CARE what the Emperor wants! I don't CARE about your excuses! GET OUT OF HERE! 

[This path to your destiny is blocked.]

WHAT?! Sharn gra-Muzgob is DEAD? And you were responsible? Get OUT OF HERE! And don't come back! I don't CARE what the Emperor wants! I don't CARE about your excuses! GET OUT OF HERE! 

[This path to your destiny is blocked.]

WHAT?! Hasphat Antabolis is DEAD? And you were responsible? Get OUT OF HERE! And don't come back! I don't CARE what the Emperor wants! I don't CARE about your excuses! GET OUT OF HERE! 

[This path to your destiny is blocked.]

You're on your own now. Just do what I've told you. Get Mehra Milo to help you find the lost prophecies. Then take those lost prophecies to Nibani Maesa. From that point, you'll have to follow her directions, and follow the prophecies. Good luck.

%PCName. Thank you for your report. I'm very happy you've been cured. Unfortunately, I've had a bit of bad news. I've been recalled to the Imperial City. You'll be promoted to Operative, and will head the Blades here in Vvardenfell until I return. I've only waited here to give you your final orders before I go.
Are you back already? I'm not finished yet.
Are you ready for your orders, %PCName? Or is there something else you want?
Are you here to discuss your orders, %PCName? Or is there something else you want?
Are you here to discuss your orders, %PCName? Or is there something else you want?
Are you ready to join the Blades, and follow my orders, %PCName?
What? Yes. I'm Caius Cosades. But, what do you mean, you were told to "Report to Caius Cosades"? What are you talking about?
All right. You're %PCName. But who told you to "Report to Caius Cosades"?
I hope you have what you are looking for. Thank you again, and good luck.

Thank you again for rescuing me from the Ministry of Truth. Now, while you are here at Holamayan, speak with Gilvas Barelo, the head of the Dissident priests. He should be able to help you with the Lost Prophecies you seek.
I'll meet you at Holamayan. Good luck. When you get there, talk to Gilvas Barelo. He should be able to help you with the Lost Prophecies you seek.
Do you have the Divine Intervention scrolls? I have an escape plan.
As I said, get Caius a copy of 'Progress of Truth' and that should tell him things he needs to know about the Nerevarine cult. Is there anything else you want to ask me about?
Go ahead. I'm afraid I don't know anything about a Sixth House cult, but I can tell you about the Nerevarine cult.
Follow me to the back of the library. We can talk there.
Yes, I'm Mehra Milo. Caius sent you? Follow me into the back of the library. We can't talk here.
Yes. I'm %Name, a librarian for the Hall of Wisdom. Can I tell you about our collection?
Yes, %PCName. I promise you my aid and counsel.

You have passed the Third Trial. Before you lies the Fourth Trial, and the Fifth Trial. I have spoken with Nibani Maesa, and I know these Trials. You wish to be called Urshilaku Nerevarine. But first, would you hear the counsel of Sul-Matuul?
Seek the Cavern of the Incarnate. This is Wisdom's Test. When you have the moon and star, bring it to Nibani Maesa. Take with you my blessing, and the blessing of our tribe.
If you have brought me the three tokens of the Warrior's Test, I can speak to you further of the Third Trial.
You wish to know about the Third Trial, and I shall tell you.
You have killed the gulakhan Zabamund. There can be no forgiveness. Leave. I have no more words for you.
You have killed the wise woman Nibani Maesa. There can be no forgiveness. Leave. I have no more words for you.
Nibani Maesa has said that she will share her counsel with you concerning the Nerevarine prophecies, and how they may concern you. You will find her in her yurt.
Nibani Maesa will speak with you further concerning the Nerevarine prophecies.
So, outlander. Have you completed the initiation rite?
So. My champion Zabamund has sent you to talk with me about the Nerevarine prophecies. Then go ahead, %PCName. Talk. I am very curious.
Yes, %PCName. You wish to talk with me about the Nerevarine prophecies. Go ahead. I am very curious.
How did you get in here? Leave at once, or I will kill you myself.
Save your breath. You do not have many more left to spend.
You have killed the wise woman Nibani Maesa. There can be no forgiveness. Leave. I have no more words for you.
You have killed the ashkhan Sul-Matuul. There can be no forgiveness. Leave. I have no more words for you.
Welcome, %PCName. They say your words and deeds have pleased our chief and wise woman.
Welcome, %PCName. Hearth and hand are yours.
The only talk I wish to hear, killer of my kin, is the talk of challenge.
The only talk I wish to hear, killer of my kin, is the talk of challenge.
Talk, outlander. Speak with respect, and I will listen.

Since you have killed one of the leaders of the Ashlander tribes, there is no possibility that you could be considered the Nerevarine of prophecy. If it had been part of the traditional struggles for tribal leadership, it would not have been dishonorable. But you slew a tribal leader for your own interests, not for the good of the tribe, and the Ashlanders will not accept such a foul murderer as their Nerevarine. It is over. Once again, the Incarnate has failed.
You are the Nerevarine. Ask, and I shall answer, with Azura's blessing.
I shall be your guide to the Seven Trials on the path of the Nerevarine. Ask, and I shall answer, with Azura's blessing.
I am ready to give you my judgement.
Go away. I am not ready yet. I told you. Hunt. Sleep. Train. Feed. Learn something useful. And return when the moons have come and gone.
You have killed the ashkhan Sul-Matuul. There can be no forgiveness. Leave. I have no more words for you.
You have killed the gulakhan Zabamund. There can be no forgiveness. Leave. I have no more words for you.
Go ahead. Do you have questions about the Nerevarine prophecies? Or other questions to ask me? Or do you bring me news of the lost prophecies?

So. They've told me of you, outlander. Or, shall I say, Clanfriend. You are hard-headed. And ignorant. But perhaps it is not your fault. My lord ashkhan says you will ask me about the Nerevarine prophecies. He also says I will test you against the Nerevarine prophecies. I must do as my lord ashkhan says. So ask your questions, and I will test you.
Go ahead. Do you have questions about the Nerevarine prophecies? Have you come to see if you pass the test? Do you think you are the Nerevarine?
You are in the wrong place, outlander. Leave, now.
Will you say you are deaf? Or stupid? Or rude? How do you explain? I have told you. You are in the wrong place. I told you to leave. But you are still here.
So. You are %PCName. The outlander who claims to fulfill the Nerevarine prophecies. You are welcome to our hospitality, outlander. But you must tell us... how can an outlander be the Nerevarine?
Welcome, outlander. The hospitality of the open-handed Zainab is always open to travelers.
Welcome, Nerevarine. We are pleased to see you.
Greetings, outlander. Have you returned with my Telvanni bride?
I underestimated you, outlander. Indeed, you have proved yourself worthy to be named Nerevarine by the Ashkhan of the Zainab.
You have lost, %PCName. So where is my exquisite shirt?
Well, %PCName. Are you ready to begin our ritual challenge?
Welcome, %PCName. Ashkhan Kaushad is always ready to listen.
Welcome, outlander.
Welcome, my friend %PCName. Did you wish to ask about the Ashlanders and the Nerevarine cult? Or was there some other business you have with me?
I am Hassour Zainsubani, %PCName. May you bless and be blessed. I do not wish to be rude, but if you have business, speak it, for I am at leisure, and would prefer to be alone with my thoughts.
Yes. What is your business with me?
I am %Name. I do not wish to be rude, but I am at leisure, and would prefer to be alone with my thoughts.
Excuse me, but I prefer to be alone.
You have slain one of my people. You must pay with your life.
You are the outlander who claims to fulfill the Nerevarine prophecies. What do you want?
You are the outlander who claims to fulfill the Nerevarine prophecies. What do you want?
You are the outlander who claims to fulfill the Nerevarine prophecies. What do you want?
You are the outlander who claims to fulfill the Nerevarine prophecies. What do you want?
You are the outlander who claims to fulfill the Nerevarine prophecies. What do you want?
You are the outlander who claims to fulfill the Nerevarine prophecies. What do you want?
You are the outlander who claims to fulfill the Nerevarine prophecies. What do you want?
What do you want?
What do you want?
What do you want?
What do you want?
What do you want?
What do you want?
What do you want?
Go away, stupid. I'd kill you, but it's not worth the trouble.
Go away, stupid. I'd kill you, but it's not worth the trouble.
Go away, stupid. I'd kill you, but it's not worth the trouble.
Go away, stupid. I'd kill you, but it's not worth the trouble.
Go away, stupid. I'd kill you, but it's not worth the trouble.
Go away, stupid. I'd kill you, but it's not worth the trouble.
Go away, stupid. I'd kill you, but it's not worth the trouble.
All right. If that's the way you want it...
All right. If that's the way you want it...
All right. If that's the way you want it...
All right. If that's the way you want it...
All right. If that's the way you want it...
All right. If that's the way you want it...
All right. If that's the way you want it...
You don't listen, outlander.
You don't listen, outlander.
You don't listen, outlander.
You don't listen, outlander.
You don't listen, outlander.
You don't listen, outlander.
You don't listen, outlander.
Oh, all right. If you insist....
Oh, all right. If you insist....
Oh, all right. If you insist....
Oh, all right. If you insist....
Oh, all right. If you insist....
Oh, all right. If you insist....
Oh, all right. If you insist....

A friend tells Ahnassi that J'Dhannar is dead. And you have killed him. Is this how you help your friends? You have betrayed Ahnassi, and hurt her very much. Ahnassi hates you now, and wants to forget you, very fast. Go away.
You attacked Ahnassi! Ahnassi wants nothing to do with you!
Ah, it is Ahnassi's VERY special friend, %PCName. Ahnassi welcomes you to the hospitality of her house.
Ah, it is Ahnassi's true and good friend, %PCName. Ahnassi can never see enough of her good friend.
Yes, please, it is Ahnassi's new friend, %PCName. So pleased to see you!
Rrrrr. When Ahnassi sees smooth moves like this, Ahnassi thinks a dancer. No? A high wall walker? If you aren't in the Thieves Guild, sweet, perhaps you should be.
Ahnassi listens. Ahnassi hears.
Just keep walking, fly. Ahnassi does not like what she sees here.
Ah...hello there. I was hoping a handsome young gentleman like yourself would happen by. Might you take a moment to help a lady in distress?
Excuse me, m'lady. Might you take a moment to help a lady in distress?
Leave me alone, outlander.
I said... leave me alone.
What can I do for you?
Can you get me out of here?
Can you get me out of here?
Can you get me out of here?
Are you a prisoner? What are you in for?
What brings you here?
I'm innocent! I was framed!
Are you a prisoner? What are you in for?
What are you doing down here?
Joshur wrote a stupid poem and now Joshur is in bad trouble.
What brings you here?
Are you a prisoner? What are you in for?
Word of your accomplishments has spread fast. You are ready for advancement.
What are you doing here? This is for Talos Cult members only.
What do you need?
Have you found Chrysamere?
Have you found the Lord's Mail?
Hello, %PCRank.
Report on Saprius Entius, %PCRank.
Report on Suryn Athones' slanders.
Have you found the traitor Honthjolf?
Have you restored our courtesy?
What do you need?
Report on Sorkvild the Raven, %PCRank.
Have you killed the breeding netch?
What's the situation with Dandsa?
Report on Jocien Ancois, %PCRank.
Have you found the scrap metal?
Hello. What do you need?
Report on the maiden's token, %PCRank.
Are you here to report on Joncis Dalomax?
What is the situation with Drinar Varyon?
What do you need?
What is the Talos Cult situation?
Report on Ragash gra-Shuzgub, %PCRank.
Have you rescued Madura Seran?
Have you dealt with the Gnisis Eggmine?
Report on the land deed.
No, I'll find someone else. But thank you, anyway.
Hello, %PCName. Thank you again for helping me acquire the Droth Dagger.
You again? Haven't you made enough of a mess of things?
Have you acquired the Droth Dagger?
Hello.  I am Geon Auline, collector of fine artifacts.
What can I do for you, %PCRank? Or is this concerning that bit of work you did for me?
What can I do for you, %PCRank? Or is this about that bit of work you're doing for me?
What can I do for you, %PCRank? Would you be interested in doing a little work for me?
Are you here for more duties, %PCRank? Or is this concerning that bit of work you did for me?
Are you here for more duties, %PCRank?  Or is this about that bit of work you're doing for me?
Are you here for more duties, %PCRank? Or would you be interested in doing a little work for me?
Are you looking for me? You want to join the Mages Guild? Or is this concerning that bit of work you did for me?
Are you looking for me? You want to join the Mages Guild?  Or is this about that bit of work you're doing for me?
Are you looking for me? You want to join the Mages Guild? Or would you be interested in doing a little work for me?
You have completed the Pilgrimage to the Shine of Maar Gan.
You have done well, Outlander. Wisdom and praise be unto you. Culminate your pilgrimage by reading the inscription on the rock.
If you are on the pilgrimage here, I may assist you. Do you want the blessings of the Temple? If you've killed Anhaedra recently, you may have to wait a few days for his body to reform.
If you are on the pilgrimage here, I may assist you. Do you want the blessings of the Temple?
By your actions, you have lost the trust of the %Faction. Until you make amends, expect no favor from me.
By your actions, you have lost the trust of the %Faction. Until you make amends, expect no favor from me.
By your actions, you have lost the trust of the %Faction. Until you make amends, expect no favor from me.
By your actions, you have lost the trust of the %Faction. Until you make amends, expect no favor from me.
What can I do for you, Telvanni?
What can I do for you, Redoran?
Do you want to join House Hlaalu?
What can I do for you, %PCRank?
Are you here for more chores, %PCRank?
What are you here for? Do you have a question? Perhaps you wish to join House Telvanni
What can I do for you, %PCRank?
Are you here for more duties, %PCRank? Or was there something else you wanted?
Are you looking for me? You want to join the Mages Guild?
What can I do for you, %PCRank?
What is it, %PCRank? Are you here looking for jobs, or are you ready for advancement?
Are you looking for me? You want to join the Thieves Guild?
Welcome, my child. Do you seek to join the Temple?
What can I do for you, %PCRank?
Are you here to serve the Temple by performing duties, %PCRank? Or have you come for something else?
Welcome, my child. Do you seek to join the Temple?
%PCName, you have found me. If you wish, you may request to join the Morag Tong.
The Morag Tong welcomes you, %PCRank.
Welcome, %PCName. What brings you to the Morag Tong?
What can I do for you, %PCRank?
You here for orders or advancement, %PCRank? Or was there something else you wanted?
Well, speak up, %PCRace. What do you want? Are you here to join the Fighters Guild?
Ho there, Outlander. Are you here to buy slaves? Slavery is quite legal in these parts, you know. Can I help you find someone in particular? Were you hoping for direction to services?
What can I do for you, %PCRank %PCName?
You may want to check your advancement in House Redoran.
Hello again, %PCName. Are you here for training? Are you here to discuss your duties to House Redoran? Or are you here for something else?
Welcome, %PCRank %PCName. Can I tell you about our services? Or, if you can donate more time and effort, would you like to become a lay servant?
Welcome. Can I tell you about the Imperial Cult? We invite you to become a lay member.
It is %PCName! Nerevarine!
Welcome, %PCName. You honor us.
Welcome, favored guest. My yurt and hearth are yours.
You kill one of my tribe, and expect to talk, outlander. You are a fool.
You kill one of my tribe, and expect to talk, outlander. You are a fool.
You come to talk? Then talk, outlander.
I will hear your talk, outlander.
You come to us, outlander? You ask US about the trade goods wanted among the Zainab? We are just the women. No one listens to us. But since you ask, we will tell you what we think.
So. You come all this way to ask us about the trade goods wanted among the Zainab. Well, then. This is a very easy matter.
Welcome, %PCName, Zainab Nerevarine. We have heard our chief does you great honor. How can I help you?
How can I help you, Nerevarine?

Ho, look! An outlander. Are you lost, poor thing? Did the big, bad beasts bite you, so you need a healer? Or do you need our trader, so he can take your gold and give you things we would throw away or give to our guar?
Come closer. Let me see you. Yes. I think it is you. The one they talk about. The outlander who claims he fulfills the Nerevarine prophecies. You should talk to Ashkhan Kaushad.
What do you want, %PCName?
Are you lost, outlander? Do you need a healer? Or a trader?

What's your question, stranger? Can I help you find your way around Pelagiad?

New to Pelagiad? Then you'll be wanting to know where the services are, I think.

I'd be happy to help you, %PCName, if you'll tell me what you need.
No trouble at all, %PCName. Just tell me what you want to know.
Yes, %PCName, I'll be glad to help you. Are you looking for any specific place around Pelagiad? Or is it something else you want?

Good day to you, too, %PCName. How can I help you? Are you looking for a specific place here in Pelagiad?

Can't you find your way around? It's not like Pelagiad is a big city.
What are you doing here? Are you looking for someone in particular?

What now? Any specific place you're looking for?
Welcome, %PCName. Mehra Milo has told us of your coming. You can find her in the library with Master Barelo.
Yes? Mehra Milo and Master Barelo should be in the library. Did you have questions about our services and hospitality? Or did you want to return to Vivec?
We are monks of a contemplative order, withdrawn here to this isolated island to be alone with our thoughts and devotions. You are welcome to partake of our services and hospitality.
Yes? Can I help you? Did you have questions about the services and hospitality we offer pilgrims?
Take your time, %PCName. Tel Vos is a bit strange -- just like Master Aryon -- and it takes a bit of getting used to.
You're welcome, %PCName. I'm %Name. We don't mind visitors here in Tel Vos, as long as they're well-behaved. Can I help you find your way around?
What brings you to, %PCName?  Is there some specific place here you're looking for?
This is Tel Vos, %PCName. If you need help, ask. If you need services, ask.

Welcome to Tel Vos, %PCName. I'm %Name. Master Aryon is our patron mage-lord, and a Telvanni councilor. As you can see, Tel Vos is a mixture of old Telvanni and new Imperial styles -- just like our Master Aryon. Can I help you find someone in particular?
What's your question?
Don't get yourself into any trouble you can't get yourself out of, stranger. We don't pad our corners for kiddies here in Tel Vos.
Stranger, a little advice. Don't get careless, or you'll find yourself in trouble. If you want a specific place here in Tel Vos, just ask me.
This is Tel Vos, outlander. Mind your manners, and everything will be fine. Ask, if you're looking for services.
What are you doing out here, stranger? This is Tel Vos tower, Master Aryon's stronghold. Are you looking for someone in particular?
You're still in Tel Vos, %PCName? Is there anything I can do to help?
Hello again, %PCName. Happy to help, if I can.
Whatever will help you, %PCName. I'm not busy. Is there some specific place you want? Or would you like a little advice?
No trouble, %PCName. Tel Vos is pretty confusing. Were you looking for services here?
Well, what do you need, %PCName? Can I help you find someone in particular?
I guess you want something.
Go ahead. Ask your question.
What do you want now? Are you trying to find some specific place here at Tel Vos? Or are you completely lost?
You again? Are you looking for services?
Yes? Are you looking for someone in particular?

These are the docks of Vos, outlander. And I'm %Name, shipmaster of Vos, at your service. What's your destination? And, if you're new to Vos, I can tell you about the local services, or point you to a specific place nearby. If you're looking for someone in particular, I might be able to help.
I'm %Name, shipmaster of Vos. What's your destination?

A visitor. We don't get many in Vos, %PCName. Can I help you?
Good day to you, too, %PCName. I'm %Name. Welcome to Vos. Is there some specific place you're looking for? Or is there anything else you need?
Pleased to meet you, %PCName. I'm %Name, and this is Vos village. Tel Vos tower, that's over to the west. Can I help you? Don't have many services here, I'm afraid.

Welcome to the village of Vos, %PCName. I'm %Name, and Master Aryon, the Telvanni councilor and mage-lord, is our patron. As you can see, we have a new tradehouse by the docks, and to the west, there's Tel Vos, the wizard tower Master Aryon is building. Isn't it something? Can I help you find someone in particular?

Don't see strangers around Vos very often. What do you want?
Vos is just a little village. If you're here looking for a specific place, you can probably find it fastest just by walking around.

Back again, %PCName? Is there anything else I can help you with?

I'm sure I can help, %PCName. If it's some specific place in Vos, I'm sure I'll know it.
I'm afraid Vos isn't very large, %PCName. If you're looking for services, I'm afraid you'll be disappointed.
I'm well enough, %PCName. You still looking around Vos? Can I help you find someone in particular?
You want something, stranger?
Go ahead.
Why are you still here? Is there some specific place you're looking for? Vos isn't very big.
Oh. You again. What? Are you looking for services in Vos? Not much here.
Yes? Are you looking for someone in particular?
I'm %Name the gondolier. What is your destination? I can also help with local information. Do you need services? Are you looking for some specific place? Or for someone in particular?

Almsivi, %PCName. I'm %Name. Don't worry. Vivec can be confusing for us, and we live here. Is there some specific place you want? Or someone in particular you're trying to find?

You're new to Seyda Neen, right? I'm %Name. I'm sure you have questions. Go ahead. Ask. I have plenty of time.

Well, hello, %PCName. I'm %name. This is Seyda Neen, Swamp Fever Capital of the World. I suppose you're wondering what's going on here. I can tell you where the services are. There aren't many. And I can tell you the latest rumors -- unless you've already hear them.
I'm %name. Welcome to scenic Seyda Neen. Gateway to Morrowind. Are you looking for someone in particular? Or do you just want a little advice?

What do you want? Are you looking for someone in particular?

No, go ahead, %PCName. I hope I can help. What's your question?

No, I don't like you. That's why I don't want to talk to you? Is there ANYONE in Sadrith Moa who likes you?
